</div>', N'<p style="text-align: justify;">If you often travel by air with PIA flights, you must know that the national flag carrier of Pakistan has banned domestic travel for all non-vaccinated people.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">If you are a frequent air traveler and prefer Online PIA flights over other airlines, there is important news. PIA, the country''s national flag carrier, has recently banned all the people who still haven’t taken the COVID-19 vaccination shots for domestic travel. In other words, the certificate for the COVID-19 vaccination has become the necessary document that you will need to show if you want to book cheap online flights with Pakistan International Airlines.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">COVID-19, Pakistan, and Domestic Travel</span>!</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The Ministry of Planning Development & Special Initiatives Federal Minister, Mr. Asad Umar, recently said that Pakistan, as compared to the other countries of Southeast Asia, had the lowest COVID-19 mortality rate. But it is time for every person in the government to play their part in combating the COVID-19 pandemic.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">That’s why no one aged 18 or more will be allowed to <a href="https://www.faremakers.com/pakistan-international-airlines-flights"><strong>book PIA ticket price</strong></a> if they are not vaccinated. All PIA flights taking off for domestic destinations from the 1st of October and onward will follow this rule.</p>

<p>

</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Applicability of the New Rule By PIA</span>!</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">So if you want to book cheap flights with Pakistan International Airlines, you will need to have a COVID-19 vaccination certificate for that. It is important to note that all the people who want to book international flights are exempted from this rule. But at the same time, they will need to follow the international regulations and requirements placed by the government of Pakistan and the country they want to travel to. The rule is also not an application for the linked international flights that first need to take off for any domestic destination.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Who Can Travel Domestically With PIA</span>?</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">You can book PIA online flights if you are fully vaccinated. All must show your covid-19 vaccination certificate. However, people who are vaccinated in some foreign countries or patients who can’t take vaccination due to clinical issues are exempted. But these people need to show proof of their immunization or medical illness before booking online airline cheap tickets.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Remarks of PIA Officials</span>!</h3>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">How Does this New COVID-19 Test Work</span>?</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">These COVID-19 tests under the self-program that the airline has just started are but lateral flow devices. The working mechanism of these devices is pretty much the same as pregnancy devices. It would help if you ran a swap (in addition to up each of your nostrils) on both sides of the back of your throat.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Moreover, a trained and highly qualified member of the Qured organization working with British Airways will observe your while you’re performing this test via video call to make sure that the process has been done correctly. At this point, your video call will be ended, and you’ll need to wait for about 20 minutes before the results come up. Then you will need to take a picture of the results along with your ID and send it to the Qured organization. Their team will then process your test results and verify them, and you will be granted a certificate that will confirm your test results.</p>

</div>', N'<p style="text-align: justify;">The most populous city in Pakistan would certainly have something enthralling. The city is home to all kinds of people. From Muhajirs and Pathans to the Bengalis and Rohingya, the city does not hesitate to embrace the folks of varying ethnicities. Being the financial hub of the country, Karachi is also a melting pot of all kinds of businesses.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">However, the commotion and the business activities are not the only things that make Karachi one of the most popular cities in Pakistan. There is a peculiar magic in its air. The Clifton Beach further enhances the significance of Karachi for the people of other cities who cannot enjoy the sea view in their localities. We truly hope that our tips will go a long way in enlightening your soul.</p>

<h3>1.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Start Your Day With Chai Paratha</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Your breakfast is not really a breakfast as long asit does not contain chai and paratha. Chai is basically a tea in which the milk is added in large quantity. The brewed milky concoctions would certainly put water into your mouth. Paratha is a crispy fried flatbread that can be found at various stalls in the city. People in Karachi believe that after eating this item, a person forgets all sorts of worries and miseries. The chai also has so many versions including karak chai and doodhpatti. Everyone has their own preference, and Lahoris will definitely cherish the original flavors.</p>

<h3>2.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Avoid Getting On Buses</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The buses of Karachi are notorious for congestion and poor quality. Though traveling through buses is quite cheap, you wouldn’t like the atmosphere and the jam-packed interior. In addition, they are also full of thieves and pickpockets who do no spare anyone. If they realize that someone has come from Lahore, they always try to deceive them as they think that Lahoris are quite well-off. However, there are some destinations where you cannot go without embarking on a bus. So, always be vigilant and careful of the professional thugs who will try to grab your attention through flattery.</p>

<p>

</p>

<h3>3.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Never Forget To Go To The Beach</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Karachi is the only city in Pakistan to have a beach. Most of the people who come to Karachi from Lahore often visit the city to witness the serenity and glamour of Clifton Beach. In addition, citizens of Karachi also feel proud on the fact that their city has such a unique and remarkable thing. So, whenever you come to this city, head straight to the beach to create unforgettable moments. Either you can jog here, or you can enjoy the camel ride.</p>

<h3>4.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Dialect Is Different</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Though the citizens here are fluent Urdu Speakers, their dialect is different than the rest of the Urdu speaking population. They usually talk informally and casually. Plus, this language also contains a number of dangerous words including bhatta, which means extortion, and bori band lash, which refers to the gunny sack. Needless to say, people coming from Lahore will have to learn lots of phrases that reflect the hidden meanings. In this way, they will be able to grasp the complexities of the lifestyle of Karachi.</p>

<h3>5.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Street Food Is Everywhere</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The food scene in Karachi is also at par with Lahore. Since the city is the amalgamation of the people of various ethnicities and cultures, its food scene also manifests the flavors of different valleys. From Afghani Pulao and Kashmiri Chai to the Sindhi Biryani and Lahore Nihari, the city hosts a wide array of delicious items. Surprisingly, there are also some Chinese restaurants from where you can get the scrumptious Chinese cuisine. The AndayWala Burger is the primary specialty of the street food. Lastly, the Chappal Kebab and the Creamy Bun are the things that will inundate the traditional Lahoris.</p>

<h3>6.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Lively Shopping Scene</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">You can buy every type of thing in Karachi. From the Iranian rugs and elegant jewelry to the expensive clothes and basic groceries, the markets in Karachi offer everything. Empress Market is a huge shopping hub that is always flooded by the locals and foreigners alike. People coming from Lahore can also visit the Sadar market, which is like Anarkali Market of Lahore. Amazingly, the book lovers can head to the Urdu Bazaar, the biggest book market in Pakistan. Though Lahore also has its own Urdu Bazaar, but the book market in Karachi is far bigger one. <h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Can You Travel to Turkey</span>?</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Turkey''s air, sea, and land borders were reopened to all international travellers on June 12th, which means that people can now opt for Turkish Airlines flights to Turkey. You can fly to Turkey from any country as long as you follow Turkish immigration procedures, except the United Kingdom, Denmark, and South Africa. .You can travel free visa, with an e-visa, or with a sticker visa, depending on your place.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">A complete list of visa policies can be found here and here. You''ll only need to fill out the passenger locator form when you arrive. All foreign travellers aged six and older travelling to Turkey must have had a COVID-19 PCR test.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Check-in Requirements</span>!</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">At the time of check-in, passengers must submit their test results to the airline. Passengers who do not provide a negative PCR test will be denied boarding the aircraft to Turkey. Until March 1, 2021, this requirement will be in effect.</p>

<ul>
<li>Russian Federation</li>
<li>Germany</li>
<li>Ukraine</li>
</ul>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Will You Need to Quarantine</span>?</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Travellers arriving in Turkey with <a href="https://www.faremakers.com/turkish-airlines-flights"><strong>Turkish Airlines flights</strong></a> or with any other airlines from the United Kingdom, South Africa, and Denmark will be needed to provide a negative test result obtained within the last 72 hours and quarantine in the area where they are staying. If the second test, which will be performed on the seventh day of their confinement, comes back negative, their quarantine will be lifted; if the test comes back positive, they will be treated.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Aside from those above, there are currently no quarantine restrictions for visitors visiting Turkey. At the departure terminal, you will be subjected to a temperature check and health monitoring.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Details of Testing</span>!</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">You''ll need to have a swab test if you experience signs of the condition. According to airport health officials, the samples are tested at airport laboratories, and the results are delivered within five hours.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">If you''re a foreigner and your test comes back positive, you''ll be taken to a private hospital recommended by the Ministry of Health''s Border Health Unit. The traveller is responsible for paying for treatment and lodging. Quarantine in state-run hospitals will be imposed on Turkish returns, escalating to mandatory quarantine.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Is Travelling to Turkey Safe</span>?</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The airports are taking every precaution to ensure the safety of their employees and visitors. Keep reading on if you want to know more about it.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Notices from CAA to Airlines, including PIA</span>!</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">As mentioned earlier, CAA has issued notices to multiple airlines, including PIA. The notices are related to the domestic flights that the airline has cancelled. <h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Total Number of Cancelled Flights</span>!</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">According to the notice of the Civil Aviation Authority, from 1st October 2021 to 18th October 2021, 383 domestic flights have been cancelled by the airliners. It is a huge number, and people with PIA domestic flight online booking and other airliners face difficulties and bad times. This number also shows that one-third of the total flights have been cancelled by regional airliners.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Instructions by Civil Aviation Authority</span>!</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The authority also said that all the airliners would need to provide an undertaking that their schedule for local flights before requesting permission for any international flights. The CAA underlined that any cancellations of domestic flights would be made solely for technical reasons or due to force majeure. Furthermore, flight cancellations under the guise of technical reasons will be permitted only with the approval of the Airworthiness Directorate.</p>

With crowning domes, glowing marble, and the stunning architecture, mosques appear extraordinarily stunning from outside. They depict the Islamic-style of architecture with pristine prayer halls and Persian carpets.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Mosques are not only the places of worship for Muslims, but they also serve as educational centers where children are imparted with the Islamic teachings. Even though most of the mosques are limited to Muslim worshippers, some also allow modestly-dressed non-Muslims for tour. Here, we are going to list 5 most amazing mosques from all over the world which will compel even the non-believers to raise their hands for prayer.</p>

<h3>1.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Al-Haram Mosque, Mecca</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Al-Haram Mosque is not only the largest and oldest mosque in the world but also the holiest site in Islam. Whenever Muslims pray, they turn their faces towards the Kaaba, a cubed building at the center of the mosque and the most sacred spot in Islam. The mosque covers an area of 400,800 square meters and can accommodate up to four million people. During Hajj, millions of people assemble here and perform the annual pilgrimage. The mosque was originally built by the Prophet Ibrahim (AS), and since then, it has been modified several times. The Holy Quran terms this mosque as the first house built for humanity’s worship of Allah.</p>

<h3>2.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Blue Mosque, Istanbul</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Constructed in the 17th century under the reign of Ottoman ruler Ahmed I, the Blue Mosque is an essential part of Istanbul’s skyline. The mosque has historical and architectural importance as it boasts the six needle-like minarets and ancient beauty. It also has five major and eight minor domes that skyrocket its captivation. The ceiling of the domes shines with more than 20,000 tiles featuring trees, flowers, and abstract patterns. It truly represents the traditional Islamic architecture and is considered to be the last mosque of the glorious Muslim period. <h3>3.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Al Aqsa Mosque, Jerusalem</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Al Aqsa Mosque is the third holiest site in Islam after Mecca and Medina. Every Muslim believes that the Prophet Muhammad (PBUH) was transported from Al-Haram Mosque to this mosque and then onto heaven during the Night Journey. The mosque is a stunning structure that has been reconstructed several times due to being repeatedly hit by the earthquakes. The interior of the mosque is supported by 45 columns, 12 of which are stone and 33 of white marble. Every Friday, thousands of Muslim worshippers come here and make their prayer in the courtyards of the mosque.</p>

<h3>4.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Sultan Qaboos Mosque, Muscat</span>:</h3>

Thousands of bulbs light up the magnificent chandelier of the mosque that took more than 4 years to complete. It is so impressive that even the Emiratis and Qataris came here and copied the design just to create the same chandelier for the mosques in their own countries. Amazingly, the uniquely designed carpet of the mosque is termed as the second-largest hand-woven carpet in the world.</p>

<h3>5.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Faisal Mosque, Islamabad</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Standing against a backdrop of Margalla Hills in the capital of Pakistan, Faisal Mosque is the fourth largest mosque in the world. The clean lines and the impressive design of the mosque make the stunning scale hard to recognize until you are up close. Visitors belonging to any religion are welcome here, but the non-Muslims are requested not to come during prayer times and Fridays. Before entering the courtyard of the mosque, leave your shoes outside and also remember to dress conservatively. </div>', N'<p style="text-align: justify;">Adding appetizing activities to your travel is the best way to experience the culture of the destination you are in. <p style="text-align: justify;">From the grilled fish of Prague to the pakoras of Pakistan, every country boasts the elegant cuisine, which can only be tasted at particular places. <h3>1.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Mexico</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Even just the thought of Mexican cuisine invokes the explicit images of corn and beans, tequila and margaritas, and the tortillas. The fiery and colorful Mexican cuisine is like the country’s fiesta. It will get your head spinning and your heart pumping.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">You can unveil the cooking secrets from a local senora and enjoy the scrumptious dishes such as chocolate, tacos, and tequila. Most importantly, you cannot afford to overlook the mole, an ancient sauce made of rich chocolate and hot chilies. The sauce is usually poured over stewed meats and tortilla wrappings. You will certainly be overwhelmed by the authenticity of this Mexican magic.</p>

<h3>2.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Pakistan</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Pakistani cuisine is considered one of the best in the world, given its depth of flavor and the lavish use of aromatic spices. Each place of the country has distinct dishes, ways of cooking, and ingredients. For example, the food in Punjab varies from that of KPK and Balochistan. In Punjab, the spicy Nehari and the Biryani are famous, while the province of Balochistan boasts the traditional Sajji and Pulao. Similarly, if you go to KPK, then the most delicious food item of this province is Charsi Kebab. Last but not least, Karachi is the capital of Sindh province and is famous for the Naragsy Koftay and Seekh Kebab. If you are from Lahore, then you can come to Karachi by <a href="https://www.faremakers.com/flights/cheap-flights-from-lahore-to-karachi"><strong>Lahore To Karachi Air Tickets Booking</strong></a>.</p>

<h3>3.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Czech Republic</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">It is a place where food lovers can indulge themselves in a superior blend of colors, spices, flavors, and music. Prague is the capital of this small European country. It boasts not only traditional food but also the vegetarian options. From potato soup and fruit dumplings to the apple strudel and the sweet gulas, the country has everything to please your taste buds.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">You can go to Forrest Bistro to taste the killer vegan desserts, or you can head to Maitreya to enjoy the heavenly beer and espressos.</p>

<strong>Must Read:</strong> <a style="color:Purple;" href="https://blog.faremakers.com/Blog/2019/12/24/7-tips-to-save-your-money-on-family-vacations"><strong>Tips To Save Money On Family Vacation</strong></a>

<h3>4.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Egypt</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Egyptian cuisine is full of legumes and fruit form the rich Nile Valley and Delta. The cuisine shares similarities with the Middle Eastern food such as koftas, kebabs, grape leaves, and the rice-stuffed vegetables. At breakfast, the popular dish is Ful Medammes that is made of fava beans cooked in salt and oil. Similarly, the Koshari is the favorite dish in lunch and is made with a layer of ice, lentils, macron, and caramelized onions. Furthermore, if you are a vegetarian, then Mahshi would do the thing. It is basically a vegetable dish stuffed with bell peppers, rice filling, and the cabbage leaves.</p>

<h3>5.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">United Kingdom</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Great Britain has a wide range of dishes that are not only delicious but also mesmerizing. Eating British food is a surrealist expedition into a parallel universe that will challenge your eyes and palate. The Pie of England is a tsunami of mashed potatoes with a pastry on the top and flesh in the middle. Furthermore, the fish fingers with the tomato sauce and the canned beans have a taste that will compel you to lick your fingers. Plus, the Sunday Roast of London is so popular that people from all across Europe come here just to taste it. People living Pakistan always check <a href="https://www.faremakers.com/flights/cheap-flights-from-lahore-to-london"><strong>Lahore To London Ticket Price</strong></a> before finalizing their tour plans.</p>

<h3>6.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Argentina</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Argentine cuisine is considered a cultural blending of Native American as well as Mediterranean influences. The only way to Argentine’s heart is through its barbecue, also known as parrillada. You should certainly not leave the country without spending an afternoon beside the warmth of an open fire, feasting on grilled meats and barbecue. Provoleta is another dish made from the sliced discs of cheese and chili flakes. It is considered as the trademark dish of Argentina.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Conclusion</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The variety of food around the world is impressive, and you will never run out of food-centric destinations. By traveling to the countries mentioned above, not only will you get exposed to the fascinating dishes, but you would also learn the culinary secrets that would enable you to cook those dishes at your home.</p>', N'best-countries-in-the-world-for-food-tourism', N'Hamza Farooq', NULL, 720, 1, CAST(N'2019-12-26T15:00:00.0000000+00:00' AS DateTimeOffset), CAST(N'2024-03-19T14:16:25.3966667+00:00' AS DateTimeOffset), CAST(N'2024-03-19T14:16:25.3966667+00:00' AS DateTimeOffset), 1)

		<img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/faremakers-connect.appspot.com/o/blogimages%2F84384293-13ae-404a-9556-5d95d5fd83bf.gif?alt=media&token=6782a4b9-e6ba-44f8-ab9f-3d0d0d2210c4" alt="visit-sao-paulo-with-qatar-airways" title="visit-sao-paulo-with-qatar-airways" class="picture" />

</div>', N'<p style="text-align: justify;">The largest city in Brazil, Sao Paulo, offers an intense cultural experience, and you can dwell in easily by taking a <a href="https://www.faremakers.com/qatar-airways-flights"><strong>Qatar Airways Ticket</strong></a>. Tropical plants, charismatic people, and vivid, bright colors, sounds, and scents surround every traveler here from the moment he gets off the plane. It is a melting pot of large, integrated populations of, among other things, Italian and Japanese cultures. This blend of cultures has created a beautiful blend of art, food, and music worth exploring. Here are some of the most enjoyable and incredible things to do in Sao Paulo.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Beco do Batman</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Before graffiti became fashionable in São Paulo, there was Beco do Batman. The narrow avenue in Vila Madalena, named after one of the first drawings on its walls, attracts thousands of tourists every year as they pass through São Paulo''s most bohemian neighborhood. Beco do Batman was one of the first open-air museums dedicated to graffiti to be established here. But it is better to explore the alley on foot as it will not be easy to stop by car to take pictures due to the traffic volume attracting the walls.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Ibirapuera Park</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Being Sampa''s answer to Central Park, Ibirapuera Park serves as a major recreational spot and is one of Sao Paulo''s top tourist attractions. It has walking and running paths, bicycle paths, forests, lakes, sports fields, and recreation areas that attract the city''s inhabitants. Bicycles can also be rented on site. There are several buildings and sculptures, including several museums and churches, and a large obelisk commemorating the revolution and a statue of Pedro Alvares Cabral. The whole park overlooks a beautiful pond. Admission to the park is free, except for special events. If you are flying abroad, regardless of your destination, then make sure that you travel with cheap airlines.</p>

<p>
<strong>Must Read:</strong> <a style="color:Purple;" href="https://blog.faremakers.com/Blog/2020/9/21/dubai-airport-inter-terminal-baggage-transfer-service"><strong>Emirates Airlines Baggage Transfer Service</strong></a>
</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Serra da Cantareira</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Just 30 minutes from the city entrance, Serra da Cantareira is a historic mountain range known for its freshwater stored in natural rock caves called cântaros that refreshed the region''s first travelers. Protected as a heritage of humanity since 1993, Serra da Cantareira is home to Parque Estadual da Cantareira, one of the largest urban forests and nature reserves in the world, and Pico do Jaragu, the highest point in São Paulo, which offers a breath-taking view of the city and surrounding countryside. From São Paulo, guests have easy access to hiking trails that lead through the Atlantic rainforest to the mountain range.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Pinacoteca do Estado</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Considered one of the most important art museums in Brazil, Pinacoteca is home to the oldest art museum in São Paulo. This museum is one of the best examples of Brazilian art in the world and houses many of Brazil''s most important 19th-century works as well as several modern exhibitions. It also includes several European works and some exhibitions on handicrafts such as paper making. The museum is located in a large 19th-century mansion in downtown Jardim da Luz.This place will take you in the past, and you can learn a lot more about it by taking Qatar Airways ticket.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Local Art Scene</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Known as one of the world''s art capitals, São Paulo is a great place to discover local and international artists, especially during the Bienal de São Paulo event. Established in 1951, the Bienal is the second-oldest art event of its kind in the world, attracting millions of visitors to the city every two years (in even years) for a series of contemporary art exhibitions throughout the city. If you''re not in town at the Bienal, there are many other great places to explore the local art scene. The São Paulo Art Museum has an extensive collection that also includes works by several European masters. Simultaneously, the Museu de Arte Contemporânea and the São Paulo Museum of Modern Art showcase a wide selection of Brazilian and international contemporary artists.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Theatre Municipal</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">This ornate gilded architectural marvel was made to showcase Sao Paulo''s importance on the international art scene. Modeled after the Palais Garnier in Paris, Theatre Municipal made its debut in 1922 as a major art exhibition when it hosted the Modern Art Year. Recently restored to its original wealth in 2011, the theatre continues to host world-class operas and other dramatic performances, often with international stars. Flying with <a href="https://www.faremakers.com/"><strong>Cheap Online Airlines</strong></a> not only does allow you to save money, but it also enables you to enjoy more by spending more once you are at your destination.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">MASP</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">This place is home to the best European workmanship assortment in South America and perhaps the Southern Hemisphere, the MASP is an absolute necessity for any craftsmanship darling going to Sao Paulo. The artistic experience begins even before entering, as the unique architectural design created by Assis Chateaubriand is a work of art in itself. The collection is extensive and includes many of Europe''s most famous masters, including Rubens and Rembrandt, Botticelli and Picasso, Goya and Cezanne, and a section dedicated to the early masters of the Americas. The museum is large, and those who like to see paintings in depth should plan two or more days here.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Conclusion</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Tourists have so much to discover in Brazil''s largest city that its main attractions require more than one visit. And getting around can take precious time exploring, which you can always do by taking a Qatar Airways ticket.</p>', N'top-things-to-do-while-visiting-sao-paulo', N'Muhammad Ibrahim', NULL, 354, 1, CAST(N'2020-09-22T10:00:00.0000000+00:00' AS DateTimeOffset), CAST(N'2024-03-19T14:16:25.3966667+00:00' AS DateTimeOffset), CAST(N'2024-03-19T14:16:25.3966667+00:00' AS DateTimeOffset), 1)

</div>', N'<p style="text-align: justify;">With its mountain scenery and city beaches, Vancouver has rightfully earned its reputation as one of the most beautiful cities in the world, which you can visit by <a href="https://www.faremakers.com/turkish-airlines-flights"><strong>booking Turkish Airlines</strong></a>. Downtown Vancouver is perfectly situated on a peninsula in the Strait of Georgia, bounded on the south by the Fraser River delta and on the north by a deep fjord extending far inland.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The snow-covered ranges of the Coastal Mountains also shine in the north. With extensive parks and a pleasant climate that maintains mild temperatures all year round, Vancouver is a paradise for outdoor enthusiasts. But it also offers a rich cultural life, fantastic shopping, and amazing cuisine.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Museum of Anthropology</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">It''s easy to be dazzled by Vancouver''s geographic splendor, but to get to know the city well, you need to start all over again. Vancouver and what is known as the Lower Mainland was populated about 10,000 years ago. Overlooking the Burrard Inlet, on the campus of the University of British Columbia, the Museum of Anthropology offers a mosaic of Aboriginal works, both ancient and modern, that make up a story rarely told to visitors to this great city. If you really want to learn about the city''s roots and its relationship with the global community, this is one of the most important things you can do in Vancouver.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Capilano Suspension Bridge</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">A walk in the woods takes on a whole new meaning when it comes to the forest in Capilano Hanging Park. Visitors stroll through the upper reaches of the old rainforest on a 140-meter (460-foot) long suspension bridge and peaks at 70 meters, crossing the Capilano River. The park also offers Cliff walk, a walkway adjacent to a granite cliff, and the Treetops Adventure, where seven suspension bridges are located 30 meters above the forest floor, with platforms where visitors have a view of the squirrel''s eye forest.</p>

<p>
<strong>Must Read:</strong> <a style="color:Purple;" href="https://blog.faremakers.com/Blog/2020/9/14/best-places-for-picnic-in-los-angeles-to-visit-with-family"><strong>Visit Los Angeles With Family</strong></a>
</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Tourists less adventurous will be delighted to walk the ground trail and see Totem Park and the Northwest natives doing traditional crafts. If you want to travel to Vancouver with any of the cheap airlines flights, then you surely can as per your convenience. But it is not advisable to trade your comfort with the money.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Grouse Mountain</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Both in winter and summer, Grouse Mountain offers unparalleled panoramic views in fine weather. It is especially true in the evenings when the city lights are on. The gondola runs daily from street level to the summit, where restaurants, activities, and wildlife await explorers all year round. When it''s snowing, Grouse Mountain is a winter wonderland that offers ice skating, snowshoeing, skiing, and snowboarding. The ski runs aren''t particularly difficult, and Grouse Mountain is a fun family trip. It is also a great place to learn to ski. In summer, Grouse Mountain is a hiker''s paradise with trails, including the famous Grouse Grind affectionately known as Mother Nature''s Stairmaster.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Granville Island</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">One of the most successful urban regeneration projects in North America, Granville Island, began as an industrial site. Over time, its warehouses and stores were abandoned and demolished as the industry expanded. Today, Granville Island has many uses. The public market, where fresh produce and fish are sold, is open daily.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">There are waterside restaurants, art galleries, and a lively entertainment scene that offers everything from comedy to contemporary theater, with loads of buskers entertaining shoppers all over the market and around the boutiques. Taking Turkish Airlinesis one of the best ways to travel for your international tours.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Kitsilano Beach</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The sandy coastline of Kitsilano Beach defines Vancouver''s laid-back, fun-loving lifestyle. It is where the locals hang out with their friends or take a dip in the outdoor heated seawater pool. The wide beach is popular with sunbathers in summer. The views from Kitsilano to the city center are stunning.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">In addition to the beach and the ocean, there are many cafes and walking routes in the area, and a lively shopping street lies a few blocks south of West Fourth Avenue. A short walk east of Kitsilano is Vanier Park, which has wide open spaces and the Vancouver Maritime Museum. Catch the little Aquabus to downtown Vancouver or Granville Island from the docks here. Although the Turkish Airline is not one of <a href="https://www.faremakers.com/"><strong>the cheap airlines</strong></a> in the world but the services it provides is worth the money.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Canada Place</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Canada Place is a striking landmark on the Vancouver skyline, with fabric rooftops that resemble sails. The object itself is colorful, and the colors represent the diversity found in Canada. Canada Place was built in 1927 to serve the Canadian Pacific Railway and other merchants shipping goods by sea across the Pacific. Today, the multi-purpose facility sends passengers on cruises to Alaska. It is also home to the Vancouver World Trade and Convention Center and a large hotel. It has been rebuilt over the years. Canada Place waterfront served as a Canadian pavilion at the 1986 World Fair.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Conclusion</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">You must be stunned by these fascinating places to visit in Vancouver. <h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Natural Beauty In Singapore</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Singapore is the well-known name for the tourist attraction. Blessed with the Natural beauty, It charms everyone. Some of the petrifying nature attraction of Singapore is mentioned below.</p>

<h3>1.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Bukit Timah Rain Forest</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">A majestic Rainforest, present near the Bukit Timah Hill. It is one of the largest ecological reserves of Singapore. The Sunlight strains through the natural Canopy of trees to zillions of different Plant and animal species. Bukit Timah is best known for hiking and adventurous trips along the nature reserves.</p>

<h3>1.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">White Palace, Swat</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Tourists visit Swat not only for its pleasant weather and natural beauty, but to also witness the historic White Palace. It was built in 1941 during the era of Swat State and has enchanting corners to surge the interest of visitors. Though the palace looks stunning throughout the year, it becomes increasingly attractive after the snowfall. The palace also acts as a guesthouse for the foreign dignitaries and diplomats.</p>

<h3>2.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Taxila</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Taxila is a significant place not only for Pakistanis but also for the people all across the globe. It is because of its historical importance. The ancient ruins and artifacts entice the history lovers from everywhere. Amazingly, the world’s oldest place of learning can also be found in the narrow alleys of Taxila. This mysterious yet intriguing place is located only 32 km north-west of the twin cities of Islamabad and Rawalpindi. Therefore, you can book <a href="https://www.faremakers.com/pakistan-international-airlines-flights"><strong>PIA Online Flights</strong></a> for Islamabad if you want to witness the ancient monasteries, ruins, and caves of Taxila. Needless to say, coming here will make you forget the problems that you might have had endured during the days of lockdown.</p>

<h3>3.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Deosai Plains</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Located between western Himalayas and Karakoram, Desosai Plains have their distinct charm that is hard to find anywhere else in the country. Snow covers the place for eight months, and in the rest of year, it brims with a wide array of colorful flowers. Another amazing feature of Deosai Plains is the Sheosar Lake, which is one of the highest lakes in the world. Visitors will be left amused for the rest of their lives as they witness the deep-blue water with the backdrop of snow-clad mountains.</p>

<p>
<strong>Must Read:</strong> <a style="color:Purple;" href="https://blog.faremakers.com/Blog/2020/5/29/the-best-cheap-food-points-in-dubai"><strong>Best Food Points In Dubai</strong></a>
</p>

<h3>4.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Astola Island, Balochistan</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Astola is a small Pakistani island located 39 km southeast of Pasni, a fishing port in Balochistan. Once you are in Pasni, you can reach this angelic place through the motorized boats. Terming the Island “unbelievable” would not be an exaggeration. Astola Island will offer you all the enjoyments that you would have endured had you ventured into the luxurious Thai beaches. So, don’t you think that you should experience the magic of this place, which is offering sumptuous joys in minimal amount? Undoubtedly, the lockdown due to corona must have restrained your financial resources, and so you must look for every way to save some bucks!</p>

<h3>5.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Keenjhar Lake, Sindh</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Keenjhar Lake is another tourist spot that can be thronged right after the end of corona. This tranquil lake can be found on the outskirts of Thatta District, Sindh. The mesmerizing views of leaves floating on the lake’s water are sure to leave you stunned. Surprisingly, this serene lake is the second largest fresh water lake in Pakistan. From coots and ibises to the ducks and egrets, Keenjhar is ideal for all kinds of winter migratory birds. In addition, humans can also ward off their exhaustion through fishing, boating, or capturing the captivating photos. Since the lake is in Sindh, the best way to come here is by booking <a href="https://www.faremakers.com/flights/cheap-flights-from-lahore-to-karachi"><strong>Lahore To Karachi Flights</strong></a> in advance.</p>

<h3>6.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Neelum Valley, Azad Kashmir</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Neelum literally means “Blue Gem”. The valley is remarkably stunning and has everything to dazzle the eyes of visitors. It is situated north of Muzaffarabad, the capital city of Azad Kashmir. The lush green mountains, dense forests, fierce streams, and the pristine pastures are the things that make Neelum Valley a heaven on earth. The milky water flowing from the large waterfalls and then mixing with the muddy waters of River Neelum provides the tourists with unending charming feelings. So, it should definitely be included in your traveling list as the corona ends.</p>

Furthermore, if the passengers declared the virus negative, then they will allow to proceed their home, while others will shifted to a quarantine.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">14th August the Independence Day of Pakistan</span>!</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Independence Day is one of the most important days for any country and the same is the case with Pakistan. It is the national day of Pakistan, which every year is celebrated with joy and patriotism on the 14th of August. Many people book air tickets from many cities to Islamabad or Lahore to enjoy the day to its fullest.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">On this exact day back in 1947, Pakistan achieved independence from the British government in the sub-continent. Then Pakistan became the first Islamic country in the world. This day is an opportunity to encourage patriotism and national togetherness, as is the day of Pakistan.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The day begins with a federal 31 rifle greeting and in the provincial capitals, 21 rifle greets. At 9:59 am in Islamabad, a siren is heard and the traffic stops for a minute. Then, together with the national song, the President raises the national flag. On occasion, the President of the country also talks to the nation each year.

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">14th August and the Resumption of British Airways Flights</span>!</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">As you would already know that all the operations of British Airways were halted to and from Pakistan because of the COVID-19. <p style="text-align: justify;">People will be able to book online flights with British Airway on Sunday, Tuesday, and Thursday each week. Each flight from the London Heathrow airport will depart at 20:30 and it will reach the international Islamabad airport at 04:20. The Flights from Islamabad will take off on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday each week. They will depart from the Islamabad international airport at 06:15 and will reach the London Heathrow airport at 15:00.</p>

This mosque is more famous from other mosques because it is built up in Shahi Qila Lahore with small white marble, in which king and his companions offered prayers and recites verses of Holy Quran. <h3>1.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Avoid Showing Affection</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">When you are visiting the China country and talking with the Chinese, then you should avoid the handshake because the majority of the Chinese dislike this type of practice and same like the Kiss and the hug is also not normal. So, when you meet with any local or the citizen of this country, just pay smile and Nod is the best way to meet them, but not show physical affection in the China state. Therefore, we are telling you the first about this because many people have the concept that the overseas are broad minded and prefer to hug to the meeting, while it’s not applicable in the China.</p>

<h3>2.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Avoid Talking About Politically Subjects</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Yes, the best avoiding point is to stay away from any politically subject because it is very sensitive point. If you want to stay away from any type of trouble, then you don’t talk about any politically subject, especially around the airport, bus station or around the police or the security members. Therefore, you should avoid these types of criticisms about anything in this country because it makes you in trouble and spoil your trip.</p>

<h3>3.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Avoid Wearing Shoes In Shrines</span>:</h3>

So, you should take off your shoes out of the entrance, and then you can enter into the temple and show respect.</p>

<h3>4.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Avoid Tipping</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">As we know, china is the hospitable and friendly state; they like to help others without any tip. So, if the citizens or the locals help you or the serve you, then don’t pay tip in the form of thank you because it is considered the rude and ill manners. Therefore, always say Thank you and you can give them gifts, but the best avoid is tip against any service. The simple and the easiest way are verbal Thanks to the locals, instead of any tipping.</p>

<p>

<h3>5.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Avoid Use Credit Cards</span>:</h3>

Might be possible after using the services you show them the card, they fall into the confusion situation, to get free from this situation, you should use the money and must be avoided using the card.</p>

<h3>6.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Avoid To Use Unlicensed Transport</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">When you step out from the airport, you will see a lot of drivers, who persuade the passengers or the customer to hire them a taxi to approach the city or the pointed location, but you should avoid them because many of them have no valid china driving license that fall in trouble. So, just avoid the private unlicensed taxis and prefer to travel on the public transport because it is affordable and trust able.</p>

<h3>7.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Avoid To Get Angry</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">When you are going to buy the souvenir or anything about shop, then you must avoid getting anger because the anger at the public lace in very uncomfortable inconvenience for the Chinese and they don’t deal with the angry person. Especially the tourists don’t move with the lose face because it imposes bad impact on others by you and they don’t bother to help you or nor guide you at any cost. So, must avoid getting anger. Always try to talk with others politely and mannerly.</p>

<h3>8.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Avoid Visiting The Attractions At The Public Holiday</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Yes, it is the basic point and the trick that protects you from the huge crowd. <h3>9.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Avoid Leaving Chopstick In Food</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Many of us are unaware about the table manners and the chopstick manner because only Chinese are using it very carefully and it is their cutlery, but this point is more important that you should avoid, while eating with the Chinese or restaurant. You never leave your chopsticks upright in your food because it is considered as the bad luck or it seems like a funeral ceremony tradition that the locals use to pray the death one person. So, you must avoid this chopstick in the food.</p>

<h3>10.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Avoid Taking Picture Without Permission</span>:</h3>

	<div class="custImageBlog">


		<img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/faremakers-connect.appspot.com/o/blogimages%2F84384293-13ae-404a-9556-5d95d5fd83bf.gif?alt=media&token=6782a4b9-e6ba-44f8-ab9f-3d0d0d2210c4" alt="Lahore-to-London" title="Lahore-to-London" class="picture" />

</div>', N'<h2>7 Things to Know Before Traveling From Lahore to London</h2>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Visiting a foreign country for the first time might be daunting, and it is always better to plan everything ahead. Doing some research before landing somewhere will save you from going astray. However, there is also no need to read the long journals of locations and maps since it would complicate the matters.
Populated by countless museums, bars, and hotels, London is certainly an overwhelming city. If you are thinking about exploring all the places in London in one trip, then perhaps you need to change your thinking. This piece is aimed at telling people the essential things before traveling to this city. Let’s get started.</p>

<h3>	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">1.	London Is Big</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">London is so big that it might take you a whole day to travel from one part of the city to another. There are also high chances that you would forget the route for the locations and end up arriving at an entirely unknown place. So, never forget to bring a digital map with you while roaming around. Google Maps can also be used to ascertain the exact map of the locations. The people of Lahore need to prefer the airline that offers cheap <a href="https://www.faremakers.com/flights/cheap-flights-from-lahore-to-london">Lahore to London ticket price</a>.</p>

<h3>	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">2.	A Shining Sun Is a Rare Event</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The people of London eagerly wait for the day when the sun comes out. As soon as they see the sun, they leave their homes and offices and flock outdoors. People genuinely enjoy the chance to take a sunbath and have some bear on the nearby beaches. It would not be an overstatement if we say that it is practically a national holiday when the mercury rises above 18 degrees.</p>

<strong>Must Read:</strong> <a style="color:Purple;" href="https://blog.faremakers.com/Blog/2019/11/29/why-do-pakistani-students-prefer-to-study-in-london "><strong>Study in London </strong></a>




<h3>	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">3.	Always Carry an Umbrella </span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">In London, it rains a lot. In fact, there is not a single day when people do not see the rainwater coming from the sky. Since the natives of London have are habitual of the rain, it does not interrupt their routine. However, the rain might spoil the joys of foreign tourists in unimaginable ways. But if you carry a durable umbrella with you, it would be easier to protect yourself and enjoy your tour smoothly. </p>

<h3>	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">4.	Local Currency </span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The rest of Europe accepts the euro, but the case with UK is entirely different. In London, only the Great British Pound can be used. Even though at some shops, they accept Euros, however, most of the transactions including ATM withdrawal and bank fee etc. will only be done in pounds. Also, you will also be charged a foreign transaction fee of three percent whether you use a credit card or get cash out. So, always make sure to maintain an additional budget in advance. </p>


<h3>	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">5.	Learning English Is Imperative </span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">If you don’t know English, then you would not be allowed even to enter the country. From shopkeepers and vendors to judges and university professor, all the people in London talk in English. So, nobody would understand what you are saying until you speak in their native language. Furthermore, given the difference in American and British English, some words might also confuse you. So, it is better to have a slight knowledge of English before going there.</p>

<h3>	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">6.	Use Public Transport Whenever You Can </span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">In London, the taxis and other private transporting facilities are highly expensive. So, it would be prudent to prefer public transport while traveling inside the city. Additionally, there is also a separate path for both the Metro Bus and Double Decker that would help you in arriving at the destination in a short amount of time. So, if you prefer public transport, then rest assured that heavy traffic jams would not disrupt your journey.</p>

<h3> <span style="text-decoration: underline;">7.	London Does Not Sleep</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Whether its day or night, the glamour of London does not vanish. The city is home to the most luxurious and lavish clubs that stay open till late at night. The bars and the pubs are always crowded regardless of the time. So, if you are a night owl, then Thursday is the best day to fulfill your fantasies.</p>

<h3>	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Conclusion</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">You will create a lot of unforgettable memories in London, but only if you know the essential things mentioned here. London never sleeps, and the astonishing of the city views will also compel you to stay up all night.Want to explore the dazzling beauty of London? Don’t wait, and book the online ticket of London through faremakers.com to have a phenomenal journey.
</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><strong>Princes’ Islands:</strong></span></h3>
<p style="text-align: justify;">It’s a Princes islands not a princess Islands, group of 9 Islands in the Istanbul form the Asian side, they are named because during the Era of Ottoman early times and the Byzantine the banish princes and monks sent here. </div>', N'<p style="text-align: justify;">We all wait eagerly for the vacations. We make ambitious plans for vacations and think that we would enjoy the holidays to the fullest. However, vacations have the potential of making our money disappear. From the airfare and lodging cost to the shopping and packing, we have to spend so much money that traveling oftentimes becomes a hard nut to crack. If you don’t approach your traveling endeavors with a plan, then you would probably overspend the money which could have been used for something better.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Therefore, it becomes imperative to plan everything in advance in order to conveniently manage traveling expenditures. To help the readers in saving their money on vacations, we have interviewed various travel experts and asked them about the creative ways of saving money while traveling. After thoroughly evaluating their answers, we have come up with 7 amazing tips that will not only save your money but also quadruple the enjoyment. Let’s reveal all of them.</p>

<h3>1.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Be Flexible With The Flights And Days</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Before taking your feet outside the home, do thorough research for the airfares of all the flights. Some airlines charge whopping sums, while others complete the same journey in <a href="https://www.faremakers.com/"><strong>Cheap Flight Tickets</strong></a>. So, it would help if you are going for the one which is economical and prestigious. Similarly, there is also no need to book the premium or business class as they would dwindle your pockets. Last but not least, try to book the flights on the days when the fare is lowest.</p>

<h3>2.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;"> Go Off-Season</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Traveling to a place off season will enable you to buy cheaper plane tickets and hotel rooms. Furthermore, given the absence of larger crowds, you will also be able to enjoy the activities without the usual commotion and hubbub of the place. For example, if you want to visit the northern areas of Pakistan, then it would be prudent if you come between March and June as the climate remains suitable during this time and the hotel rooms are also available at a low price.</p>

<h3>3.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Use a Travel Agency</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Instead of locating all the things manually, you should be hiring the services of a reputable travel agency as they offer package deals on hotels and flights that are much cheaper than you would get by paying for them separately. Not only your time would be saved, but you would also save lots of bucks, which can be used on other occasions.</p>

<h3>4.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Look For Free Activities</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">After doing proper research, you will come to know that there are lots of free activities you can enjoy in the area. For example, there can be a festival nearby, or there can be an exhibition where you can participate free of cost. Similarly, some museums also offer discounted admissions on particular days. You can get the in-depth knowledge of free activities by looking at the community calendar of the particular area.</p>

<h3>5.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Don’t Book Expensive Hotels</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">On your destination, you will find plenty of hotels. Some of them might be charging $100 a night, while others might be asking for $1000 a day. Even though you will be able to enjoy luxury amenities in the expensive rooms, but you have come here to explore the nature, and not to spend your entire money on a gold-plated toilet! So, if you can accommodate yourself in a cheaper room, then why go for a highly expensive one?</p>

<strong>Must Read:</strong> <a style="color:Purple;" href="https://blog.faremakers.com/Blog/2019/12/23/dont-do-these-rookie-mistakes-while-traveling"><strong>Rookie Mistakes While Traveling</strong></a>

<h3>6.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Bring Some Food With You</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Buying expensive meals from the restaurants again and again is not a wise move. You should bring some food and drink with you so that you can satiate your hunger on the plane or at the airport. The almond packets and the butter biscuits will also do the thing for you.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Similarly, most of the restaurants offer meals at discounted prices to allure potential customers. So, try to look for deals to save money whenever you go to restaurants.</p>

<h3>7.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Use Public Transport</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Instead of costly cabs, you should be taking advantage of public transport. Through public transport, you can conveniently travel from one part of the city to another at a low price. Furthermore, the buses do stops at prominent destinations, thereby giving you a chance to explore the ins-and-outs of the city. Apart from buses, rickshaws and wagons can also be used to reach the desired destination in economical rates.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Final Thoughts</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Your travel dreams are worth pursuing, and money should not be getting in the way of your travel fantasies. All you have to do is approach the things smartly, and you would never run short of money on your next vacation. If you have anything to ask, you can ask your questions in the comment section below. <strong>Must Read:</strong> <a style="color:Purple;" href="https://blog.faremakers.com/Blog/2021/7/8/how-to-spend-a-family-summer-vacation-in-london"><strong>Family Summer Vacation In London?</strong></a>
</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">British Airways and Surge in Flights</span>!</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">British Airways is getting back to a business considering air travel, and now more and more people will be able to book online flights to London and other parts of the world with this airline. According to the latest news from the officials, the airline has experienced a staggering 96 per cent increase in the searching of flights with British Airways by travellers. The officials say that most of these online British Airways flight searching can translate into accurate booking.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The officials say that it is the highest volume that the airline has experienced this year, and it is planning to convert it to actual travel by offering more British Airways flights.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">What to Know Before Traveling with British Airways</span>?</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The COVID-19 epidemic has changed much on British Airways and the overall international airline industry. The British flag carrier has in store for us in the coming months regarding British Airline flight booking from a new catering offering to health passports.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Firstly, it is very probable that travellers will have to hold COVID-19 travel certificates while <a href="https://www.faremakers.com/flights/cheap-flights-from-lahore-to-london"><strong>booking online flights to London</strong></a> or any other city. This includes the required testing of vaccine status before flying to the United Kingdom. Similar to the airport visa screening process, all may be verified by a staff member before travelling.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">But British Airways has made several efforts to shorten airport wait times and confuse the people booking online British Airways flights. Those flying to the United Kingdom may utilize the VeriFLY application before they even leave home to obtain digital documents verification.</p>

T<p style="text-align: justify;">he COVID-19 also allowed British Airways to revise its offer of onboard catering offerings. The buy-on-board shorter-haul menu was first halted, and the water bottle and a complimentary snack took their place. The water bottle rule will remain the same in the coming months whether you book Lahore to London flights with British Airways or any other site.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Final Words</span>!</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">According to British Airways officials, it travels to green and amber locations more than any other United Kingdom airline. </div>', N'<p style="text-align: justify;">If you have taken Qatar Airways flights to Qatar and want to know the procedure for the COVID-19 vaccine in Qatar, then you have come to the right place.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Qatar is undoubtedly leading the world when it comes to providing vaccination to citizens and the general public. Moreover, the country''s efforts have also allowed it to record some of the lowest cases of coronavirus in the whole world. With every day, more and more citizens of Qatar are getting vaccinated. In this article, you will learn how you can achieve it means how you can get vaccinated in Qatar. The process will be getting registered for vaccination. Moreover, this article will also help you understand which groups of people are being prioritized and how it will cost you to get yourself vaccinated. It’s all-important if you’re looking for <a href="https://www.faremakers.com/"><strong>affordable air tickets</strong></a> to travel from Qatar to someplace else.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Register Yourself for the Vaccination</span>?</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">You will need to open the official online portal the government of Qatar has announced. On this portal, you will need to register yourself. The system will ask you to log in to your NAS (National Authentication System) using your QID (Tawtheeq username) and respective password. The registration will set you up to get your COVID-19 vaccination only if you are eligible for that. Otherwise, you will need to wait to get your name mentioned as eligible in the system. Getting vaccinated will allow you to get your Qatar airways flights quickly without worrying about quarantine.</p>

<p>
<strong>Must Read:</strong> <a style="color:Purple;" href="https://blog.faremakers.com/Blog/2021/4/8/qatar-airways-operate-worlds-first-covid-19-vaccinated-flight"><strong>Qatar Operate COVID-19 Vaccinated Flight</strong></a>
</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">How to know if someone is eligible or not</span>?</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">If you want to know that if you’re eligible for COVID-19 vaccination, you need to keep in mind that Qatar''s authorities and the government have created multiple population groups. Some group will be prioritised over other based on the level of the COVID-19 risk. There are currently three different groups which are as followed:</p>

<ul>
<li>Older people</li>
<li>Key healthcare workers</li>
<li>People having some chronic conditions</li>
</ul>

<p style="text-align: justify;">If you don’t belong to any of the groups mentioned above, your name will be registered, and you will be recorded as an interested person for the vaccination. Moreover, as mentioned earlier, you will need to wait, and once you are eligible, you will get your vaccination shot.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Will it be Free</span>?</h3>

Other than that, each passenger will be allowed to carry 30 kilograms of weight as baggage.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Other than the weight requirements, all the travelers also need to provide their details, and they will need to use the PASS TRACK mobile application to pass the information. Lastly, and most importantly, all the passengers must also provide the results of the PCR test with a negative status, and it must be taken in the last 72 hours.</p>

	<div class="custImageBlog">


		<img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/faremakers-connect.appspot.com/o/blogimages%2F84384293-13ae-404a-9556-5d95d5fd83bf.gif?alt=media&token=6782a4b9-e6ba-44f8-ab9f-3d0d0d2210c4" alt="saudi-airlines-flights-to-saudi-arabia" title="saudi-airlines-flights-to-saudi-arabia" class="picture" />

	<div class="custTitle">


	    <p></p>


	</div>


</div>', N'<p style="text-align: justify;">No other country in the world is so misunderstood as the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, and it''s worth a visit by taking <a href="https://www.faremakers.com/saudi-arabian-airline-flights"><strong>Saudi Arabian airline flights</strong></a>. No other country that is so diverse and rich in culture, heritage and natural beauty is worth visiting.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">It is a country with many areas of beautiful oases and dramatic mountain peaks and beaches. This article provides a brief introduction to various aspects of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">History</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The National Day of Saudi Arabia commemorates the establishment of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia by King Abdul-Aziz. The visionary king tirelessly fought to unite his country after decades of riots and uncertainty from warring tribes and competing interests. King Abdul-Aziz, head of the Al-Saudi family, finally managed to unite the country under the name Saudi Arabia on September 23, 1930, and every year since then, this day is a great celebration.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Citizens come together to honor traditional customs, honor the nation, and pay tribute to those who helped build the country, including the ruling Al-Saud family.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Foundation</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The Qur''an is the foundation of Saudi Arabia''s society faith, government, education, and law. The Koran teaches many educational values, including "observing the earth and heaven" by studying the natural sciences such as biology and Tirmidhi, getting to know angels, and praying for the welfare of people who seek knowledge.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">People often value the word Quran in school textbooks, but there is controversy over whether schools should teach it. Most of the more than 700 non-profit charities accept donations to make the Koran a subject of research.</p>

<p>
<strong>Must Read:</strong> <a style="color:Purple;" href="https://blog.faremakers.com/Blog/2020/10/10/8-art-and-architecture-places-to-visit-in-pakistan"><strong>Architecture Places To Visit In Pakistan</strong></a>
</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Climate</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">June to August more than 110 degrees Fahrenheit noon in the desert; humidity in coastal regions up to 100 percent; elsewhere, mild; possible winter temperatures in the northern and central regions fall below zero; rainfall, from zero for up to 10 years in Rub Al-Khali, to 20 inches per year in the mountains of Asia Province.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">If you are from Pakistan, you will not have any trouble to getting used to the Saudi climate, and you can take Islamabad to Jeddah flight to reach this amazing country.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Online Schooling</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Colleges such as the Dean''s Office and Distance Learning Department at King Abdul-Aziz University in Jeddah provide flexibility in student schedules, allowing them to study at their local library or home. Citizens are striving to get more online learning opportunities in Saudi Arabia today, hoping that in Saudi Arabia elsewhere, we will soon accredit online learning.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Essayists, for example, Hend Suliman Al-Khalifa, writer of the e-Learn Magazine report, advance online colleges, for example, Arab Open University.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Language</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Saudi Arabs speak Arabic, which is the official language of the Kingdom, but tourists who do not know any Arabic should not feel intimidated. Many Arabs speak English, or at least enough English to facilitate communication. Most of the road signs are written in Arabic and English, enabling foreigners to move around the area. English-speaking visitors are likely to do well in Saudi Arabia, not knowing any Arabic phrases, but knowing a few keywords and phrases can score many locals'' points.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">It''s advisable to learn a few phrases in the Arabic language before taking Saudi Arabian airline flights.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Weekends</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">In Saudi Arabia, Sunday is the first day of the working week, so weekends are celebrated on Friday and Saturday. Friday is considered a family day throughout the Kingdom, and many families spend the day praying in mosques and at activities. For this reason, many shops and restaurants are closed most of the day on Friday. Some venues will open at 2pm, but others will wait until 4pm, before unlocking the door. Restaurants are the exception to this rule. Some of the restaurants offer lunch meals.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Travelers who will be in the Kingdom over the weekend should plan to accommodate longer queues and heavy traffic. If you want to have a memorable weekend, then consider taking <a href="https://www.faremakers.com/"><strong>Islamabad to Jeddah</strong></a> flights if you are from Pakistan for a couple of unforgettable days.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Currency</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The national currency of Saudi Arabia is the Saudi Riyal (SAR). Guests can exchange local currencies at the airports upon arrival, and it is best to bring dollars or Euros for the exchange as some national currencies are not accepted.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Riyals come in 500, 100, 50, 10, and 5 banknotes. Coins are issued in denominations of 1 rial and 2 riyals, and riyals are divided into halala. ATMs are available at all airports and shopping centers.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Getting There</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">In total Saudi Arabia offer 28 different airports in which 15 are domestic and 13 are international. It’s comparatively a very big number that demonstrate that you won''t have to worry about traveling locally or internationally while being in the KSA. If you’re from Pakistan specially from major cities then you can book your flights to KSA from any renowned airline agency.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Once you arrive at KSA, it''s easy to navigate from city to city whether it big or small by taking services of car-sharing companies or local bus and taxi services. Other than that the railway system of Saudi Arabia only connects famous regions such as Riyadh and other famous places in eastern province.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Conclusion</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">These are some of the most important facts you have to keep in mind while traveling to Saudi Arabia. Whenever you take Saudi Arabian airline flights, keeping these facts will help you move around with more confidence.</p>', N'8-interesting-facts-about-saudi-arabia-with-saudi-arabian-airline-flights', N'Muhammad Ibrahim', NULL, 625, 1, CAST(N'2020-10-12T10:00:00.0000000+00:00' AS DateTimeOffset), CAST(N'2024-03-19T14:16:25.3966667+00:00' AS DateTimeOffset), CAST(N'2024-03-19T14:16:25.3966667+00:00' AS DateTimeOffset), 1)

That’s why all the passengers will be required to provide their certificates with negative results without any exceptions. Moreover, the passengers will also be required to complete their 14 days necessary and mandatory quarantine or isolation period once they reach China.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">On the other hand, all the passengers reaching Pakistan from China will only have to submit their personal details.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The first and by far the most obvious way is to use online flight portals to find the best PIA flight booking options. Choosing a reputable agency might cost you a little more, but it ensures you stay away from all unwanted situations. Moreover, they also have excellent customer care service to acquire any time you want to get the latest information about your flights.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The second tip that we are about to unfold will allow you to choose only the best available option. You must not stay confined to only one type of flight. In fact, you must consider other flight options and online portals to compare your flight rates. It''s not necessarily true that one online portal or carrier always offers the cheapest airfare. There are always fluctuations, and you can find better rates in different places from time to time. You can find information about cross-airline flights as well. This way you will have enough information to make an informed and well-thought decision to find the best available flights.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Consider Airports Which are Nearby</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">It would help if you did not fly from the airports which are far away. That''s because it can create many complications. It''s quite possible that you won''t be able to reach the airport at your scheduled time and miss the flight altogether. Moreover, travelling to some faraway from the airport will cost you a lot of fuel as well. You might also not have the required information and familiarity with that area that can also cause problems. On the other hand, if you take flights that will fly from the airport exactly in the same city as you are, then all of these problems will be suddenly eliminated. </div>', N'<p style="text-align: justify;">Turkey is a Muslim majority country located in Europe. <p style="text-align: justify;">Winter starts in Turkey in December as temperatures go as low as 7-8 degrees Celsius. Tourism lovers come to turkey in winters, and the land turns into heaven in the cold season. <h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Spend Some Days In Istanbul</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Istanbul is a picturesque city in Turkey, and it is termed as one of the most beautiful tourist destinations in Europe. Each year, Istanbul hosts thousands of travel enthusiasts that go back to their countries with unforgettable memories.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">In winter, snow completely covers this beautiful city, and all the historical landmarks depict an entirely different view. You would see the domes of Hagia Sophia completely hidden under the snow. <h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Catch The Fishes</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Every winter, millions of fishes migrate from the Black sea to the relatively warm Mediterranean. Indeed, this migration of fishes gives an amazing opportunity for the fish catchers. You will find the huge crowds of people in the waterway that only come here to hunt the fishes. Similarly, some traditional dining restaurants also exclusively offer the delicacies of winter fish. So, tasting the winter fish of Turkey will definitely leave you stunned.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Enjoy The Thick Turkish Coffee</span>:</h3>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Visit The Snowy Peaks Of Van</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The Van region is located in southeast Turkey and is widely known for its wilderness and high altitude. The region also has a lake that is the biggest lake in the country and does not freeze even in January. Small islands and ancient castles dot the lake. Due to snowfall, Akdamar Island becomes amazingly impressive, and so, it is worth a visit.</p>

	<div class="custImageBlog">
