</div>', N'<p style="text-align: justify;">Nature is a source of delight and calm for all of us. People who do not find the peace of mind anywhere ultimately embrace it in the mountains and meadows. Similarly, getting exposed to the natural places is remarkably conducive for mental health. Not only that, we feel rejuvenated after inhaling the cool breeze. In short, nature has all the potentials to do wonders to our mental as well as physical health. God has gifted our earth with astonishing natural spots. From the serene lakes and dazzling mountains to the lush pastures and endless canals, we have an abundance of natural wonders.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Like in many countries, the natural attractions in Argentina are also breathtaking. These magical spots are the primary reason why people are crazy about flooding the country through <a href="https://www.faremakers.com/turkish-airlines-flights"><strong>Turkish Airlines Flights</strong></a>. Give this article a solid read if you really want to know how fascinating and compelling these natural attractions in Argentina are.</p>

<h3>1.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">El Calafate</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The tourism in El Calafate is quite challenging and unique. The college’s proximity to your houses allows you to spend time with parents and serve them. El Calafate has all the amenities that the foreign visitors would ever demand. People here also do hiking and biking to create unforgettable memories. Sophisticated shops, prestigious hotels, and lavish restaurants are all here. Just ward off the problems, and let the magic of the nature begin.</p>

<p>
<strong>Must Read:</strong> <a style="color:Purple;" href="https://blog.faremakers.com/Blog/2020/5/9/witness-the-dazzling-beauty-of-jakarta-with-qatar-airways"><strong>Dazzling Beauty Of Jakarta</strong></a>
</p>

<h3>2.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Fitz Roy</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The peaks of Fitz Roy look like a pair of cat’s ears. It is the most iconic sight in Argentina because of its sheer splendor and grandeur. It is considered to be the most technically challenging climbs in the world and the climbers from all across the world come here to test their skills. Among all the climbers, only a handful of experienced ones make it to the top. In addition, camping is also popular in the surrounding areas of Fitz Roy. Once you feel tired after the arduous journey, you can sit by the nearby lake to calm your nerves.</p>

<h3>3.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Esteros del Ibera</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Though this natural reserve is less visited, it is still one of the most amazing natural wonders in the country. The marshlands here prove that the landscape in Argentina is immensely flexible. The temperature of Esteros del lbera is highly unpredictable, and you must check the weather forecast before visiting this place. Wildlife is the primary source of attractions for the tourists. It has various kinds of species including the monkeys, deer, and otters. Coming here with your kids and relatives will be a worthwhile experience.</p>

<h3>4.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Iguazu Falls</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Iguazu Falls are located on the border between Brazil and Argentina. The falls depict the fierceness of Iguazu River as it collapses suddenly into a deep ravine. There are so many Irelands nearby and each of them in itself a marvel. The intense torrent throws the water dozens of feet in the air, so always be ready to get wet. There is only one path to reach the falls: train ride, or walking by feet for another 30 minutes. There are some adventurists who are not afraid of even to dive deeper into the falls. You can get <a href="https://www.faremakers.com/"><strong>Cheap Flights Tickets</strong></a> from the respective airlines if you buy in bulk.</p>

<h3>5.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Salinas Grandes</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">If you travel from southern side of the country to the north, you will find the Salina Grandes salt flats. It is located on the border of Jujuy and Northwestern Salta provinces, and has secured distinct positions in because it is 4,000 meters above sea level. These salt flats also help to maintain the normal temperature of the environment, which has once again manifested the suitability of the Salinas Grandes. The spot is also amazing for the photography lovers as they can find a plethora of beautiful scenes in the surroundings. When it rains, the salt flats are converted into a still mirror, and you will feel as if you are walking in the clouds.</p>

<h3>6.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">RÍO MINA CLAVERO</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">This natural wonder will certainly take you by surprise. Cordoba is the mountainous province in Argentina that showcases the picturesque landscapes. If you are in Buenos Aires, you can easily reach Cordoba. The RIO MINA CLAVERO is a stunning water channel in the place that joins to two rivers together. <p style="text-align: justify;">Besides being the most magnificent, Mecca is amazingly beautiful and has many historical and Islamic places you should visit during your trip to Umrah. You can consider the religious places in Mecca during your visits to the Umrah.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">In this article, we''ll look at the best places to visit in Mecca during your Umrah.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Jannatul Mualla</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">This graveyard is about a ten-minute drive from the Great Mosque of Mecca. Some places become a priority for visitors because of the concentration in the vicinity of the famous mosque. It, along with the Genie Mosque, is easily accessible on any schedule, however tight. Here are buried relatives and dear to the Prophet (peace be upon him), namely Hazrat Khadija (may God be pleased with her) and Hazrat Abu Talib, who supported him throughout his life.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">This fact alone is enough to express our special interest in this site. Our Prophet''s grandfather Abdul Muttalib and great-grandfather Abd Munaaf also live in the cemetery. Pay your respects to the inhabitants of the cemetery.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Hundreds of thousands of people fly from Karachi for Umrah, and you can take <a href="https://www.faremakers.com/umrah-packages"><strong>Umrah Packages Karachi 2020</strong></a> this year for your Umrah travel.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Jabbal-e-Noor</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Located at the top of Jabal Al Noor, you can visit the sacred cave of Hira (Ghari Hira). It was here that the Prophet Muhammad (PBUH) received the initial revelations of the Koran in 610 BC. Jabal-al Noor is another famous name for this mountain because of the light on it at night. The Prophet felt a growing need for isolation and began to feel more and more lonely before receiving revelations from Angel Jibreel (AS). He was visiting the Hira Cave and meditating day and night with supplies for himself.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Mount Arafat</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Almost a million pilgrims visit Mount Arafat every year during their pilgrimage. According to the hadith, Mount Arafat is where all the Muslims who will be responsible for the time of resurrection will gather. Mount Arafat is of great importance during the pilgrimage period.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Pilgrims visit it and perform pilgrimage rituals, pray and make important supplications (Dua) as the Sunnah Prophet Ibrahim (blessing).If you are from Islamabad, then consider taking umrah packages Islamabad 2020 for your Umrah travel.</p>

<p>

</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Mina</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The mine is located in the eastern part of Mecca and is a 5 km long valley. During the pilgrimage, pilgrims stay in this valley on the 8th day of Dhul Hajj, and then on the 10-13th day of Dhul Hajj. Mina is well known for how busy it is during the annual Hajj pilgrimage, also known as the "city of tents." More than 100,000 air-conditioned tents provide temporary accommodation for pilgrims visiting during the pilgrimage festival.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Jamarat Bridge is located in the Mina Valley. It is the stoning of the satanic ritual performed between sunrise and sunset on the last day of Hajj. Mina is where pilgrims threw stones in memory of the occasion when the Prophet Ibrahim stoned a Shaitan as he tried to stand between him and the order Allah had given him.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">The Site of Battle of Badr</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The Battle of Badr is mentioned in the Koran because it was one of the first Islamic battles fought by the Prophet Muhammad. People can still get a glimpse of this battlefield when visiting the city of Mecca.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The Battle of Badr is very important in Islamic history and was also very important to the lives of the Prophet and his followers, who fought for the only true and acceptable religion of Allah (SWT) against the Makkah''s pagans and won the battle with angles'' support.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">This place is located almost 330 kilometres from Mecca. You can also take Umrah Packages Karachi 2020 if you are from the province of Sindh.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Masjid al-Jinn</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The incident related to this place, which is very supernatural in nature, aroused particular interest in this mosque. The Holy Prophet (peace be upon him) was influencing them when reciting the Holy Qur''an to a group of passing Genies. No wonder these Genies felt the grace of these verses of the Koran and fell under their spell. The Holy Qur''an bears witness to this in Surah Jinn and gives a good basis for believing this incident.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The mosque was erected to celebrate this conversion. It can also be considered one of the representative examples of the architecture of the mosques that flourish in Mecca. It is visited only by men. Not because it''s a remote location or anything, it''s only a 10-minute spin from the Grand Mosque.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Women may praise it from afar, but cannot enter because the mosque does not support division properly into male and female chambers.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Bir Tuwa</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">It is one of the valleys in Mecca that was once isolated and uneven. It is currently crowded with buildings. Today, the name Bir Tuva has been limited to a well in Jarwal, called Tuva. The Prophet spent the night at this well. Then in the morning, he purified himself of its water and entered Mecca. It is located at the bottom of Mecca towards the north in Jarwal. The word "Tuva" means a pleated well.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Who Can Enter Saudi Arabia</span>?</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Arrivals from Pakistan have been temporarily barred from entering the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. Only a limited number of Pakistani visitors will be permitted to enter Saudi Arabia. As of present, the following individuals are excluded from the travel ban, and they can book airline flights to Saudi Arabia:</p>

<ul>
<li>Saudi residents, along with their families and workers accompanying them</li>
<li>Diplomatic personnel along with their families</li>
<li>Personnel in the healthcare supply chain, as well as healthcare practitioners</li>
<li>The crews of airlines</li>
<li>Fully vaccinated citizens that also possess valid residency permits (Iqama)</li>
</ul>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Air travel to Saudi Arabia from Pakistan is only permitted for those in the aforementioned exempted categories. All Pakistani travelers must continuously check airline schedules for the most up-to-date information to book online flight tickets to Saudi Arabia.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Vaccination Requirements for the Permitted Travelers</span>!</h3>

All visitors are required to provide proof of COVID-19 vaccination with one of the following vaccines:

<ul>
<li>Pfizer-BioNTech two dosages</li>
<li>Oxford-AstraZeneca two dosages</li>
<li>Moderna in two dosages</li>
<li>One dosage of Janssen by Johnson & Johnson</li>
</ul>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The time between taking the final dose and booking airline flight tickets to Saudi Arabia should not be shorter than 14 days. Additionally, passengers who have finished two doses of Sinovac and Sinopharm will be allowed to get an extra dosage of one of the vaccinations mentioned above, which are also approved in Saudi Arabia.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">The Requirements for Testing</span>!</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">All visitors (excluding Saudi nationals and children under the age of eight) must provide a negative PCR test certificate produced by a certified laboratory valid for 72 hours from the moment the test is performed until departure from the country. Visitors with <a href="https://www.faremakers.com/"><strong>Online Flights Booking</strong></a> to Saudi Arabia will be refused to board if they do not have the certificate. Except for travelers under eight, all guests must submit to two PCR tests, one within the last 24 hours of their arrival and one on the fifth day of arrival. If the test results are negative, they are allowed to exit quarantine on the fifth day.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">The Camargue, Provence</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The Camargue is a boggy delta between the Rhone and the Mediterranean that looks like another continent. This area is dotted with red salt flats, salty ponds, and the pristine gardens, and the visitors will get lost in its wilderness. Amazingly, you will also have a chance to witness the free-roaming horses and several of its bird species, including herons. Furthermore, if you are lucky enough, you will also spot the pinkish flamingos that will certainly calm your nerves and soothe your soul. Undoubtedly, the Camargue is heaven in France.</p>

Today, Antibes is a sumptuous resort with sandy beaches, beautiful streets, and the local restaurants. However, the old Antibes is a region of the fifth century and was built when the Greek was involved in the trade. Surprisingly, the acclaimed artists, including Picasso and Fitzgerald, also lived here and captured the elegance of the area in their paintings.</p>

Here, you will find the stunning sculptures and carvings that have inspired lots of travelers and artists, including Claude Monet. Additionally, visitors can also relish boating to explore the jagged cliffs thoroughly. The views from the boat are stunning, and you will be filled with enthusiasm after the excursion.</p>

The great serving and the yummiest food presentation gives you the gratifying experience regarding this restaurant under the cheap money. You should try there the Ottoman cuisine, meatballs and the Karniyarik.</p>

<h3>6.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Ficcin Restaurant</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The Ficcin upscale restaurant is built at the İstiklal Mahallesi, Kallavi Sk. This is really a small look restaurant with the affordable rates with the healthy dishes. Don’t miss to add it to exploring during the eating. They also stated that the results of the tests should not be older than 72 hours before <a href="https://www.faremakers.com/saudi-arabian-airline-flights"><strong>Flights to Saudi Arabia</strong></a>.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">The Reason for Travel Ban</span>!</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">In response to the growing number of Covid-19 incidents, the KSA (Kingdom of Saudi Arabia) placed a travel ban on a number of countries, including Pakistan and India, on April 24.The Philippines, Sri Lanka, and Indonesia were also subject to the ban, while the Saudi Civil Aviation Authority General Authority of Civil Aviation (GACA) released a notice imposing a temporary travel ban on European Union citizens.</p>

	<div class="custImageBlog">


		<img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/faremakers-connect.appspot.com/o/blogimages%2F84384293-13ae-404a-9556-5d95d5fd83bf.gif?alt=media&token=6782a4b9-e6ba-44f8-ab9f-3d0d0d2210c4" alt="cheap-umrah-packages-islamabad-2020" title="cheap-umrah-packages-islamabad-2020" class="picture" />

	</div>


</div>', N'<p style="text-align: justify;">By visiting sacred places through <a href="https://www.faremakers.com/umrah-packages"><strong>Cheap Umrah Packages Islamabad 2020</strong></a>, you can quickly sketch in memory a historical occasion or personality associated with the place. All pilgrims are interested in different places that play a significant role in the history of Islam. As Muslims, we should be aware of our remarkable history.Indeed, for Muslims, Masjid Nabawi is the most beautiful and eye-catching holy place in Medina.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">But consider visiting the following places in Medina while offering Umrah.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Masjid-e-Quba</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The Quba Mosque is the oldest mosque of Islam and is one of three historically important mosques in Medina. Its great respect and importance come from the fact that it was founded by the Prophet Muhammad P.B.U.H.when he was going back to Makkah.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">As old as it seems to be, it has a particular wonder and could be lovelier than being worked by the best man the world has ever observed.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Garden of Hazrat Salman Farsi R.A</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">This notable garden results from 300 date palms planted by the Prophet Muhammad P.B.U.H. himself to free his darling buddy Salman Farsi R.A. from imprisonment. Salman Farsi R.A. was the initial individual to interpret the Koran into a Persian language. There are still date palms in the nursery, and huge dates show up here every year.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">It is located near Masjid Quba, and you should visit it when traveling to Medina. You can take many Umrah Packages in Pakistan, but we advise you to choose the one that suits you the best.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Masjid Al-Qiblatain</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">If you are interested in architecture, you will immediately fall in love with this mosque. It consists of traditional design with minarets, double domes, and a raised prayer hall. What makes this mosque unique? Every mosque has qibla, the direction in which Muslims pray, or the Holy Kaaba in Mecca. However, at the time of this mosque, the qibla pointed towards Jerusalem.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Allah''s revelation instructed Muslims to pray towards the Kaaba, after which all mosques had to change their qiblas.</p>

<p>
<strong>Must Read:</strong> <a style="color:Purple;" href="https://blog.faremakers.com/Blog/2020/9/28/holy-places-that-you-must-visit-while-offering-umrah"><strong>Holy Places To Visit While Offering Umrah</strong></a>
</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Jabal Uhud</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The early Islamic period was a great challenge for Muslims. Islam was still in its outset, and its adversaries were developing. The Muslims have fought three battles with Kufaar-e-Makkah, and the battle of Uhud has its weight. It is known that Mount Uhud has aroused the interest of pilgrims for centuries. The plain bordering this mountain served as a battlefield. Highlights are the Archer''s Mound, Uhud Cave, and Martyrs'' Cemetery.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Only a few can climb, and even that because of their curiosity, motivation, and health. The recommended precautions are, above all, good pace and hydration.Also, do not entrust your goods to other people or take anything from them. It is the reason why so many pilgrims travel with ease.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">The Well of Hazrat Uthman R.A</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">This 1,400year-old well belongs to the Holy Prophet''s very close companion P.B.U.H., Hazrat Usman R.A. The Prophet P.B.U.H., stated, "Whoever purchased this well from a Jew and gave free water to the Muslims went legitimately to Janna." At that point, Hazrat Usman R.A. complied with the Prophet''s P.B.U.H. order and gave free water from the well to all Muslims.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">It is a living site of Islamic lessons that Muslims are pleased with. If you are planning to visit Hijaz this year to offer Umrah, consider taking umrah packages Islamabad.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Masjid e Ghamama</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">It is a non-existent mosque from ancient times, right next to Roza-e-Rasool, and marks the Prophet (peace be upon him) led the Eid prayer. But these Eid prayers were not offered in any suitable mosque. Far away from here! The Saudi government later built the mosque that pilgrims see today. However, for another reason, it is called the Ghamama Mosque. The Prophet P.B.U.H. has visited this plain on other occasions other than Eiden.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">On one such event, he needed to petition God for a downpour. What''s more, since the climate was shady when the Prophet P.B.U.H. asked there, it enlivened the mosque''s name. Ghamama implies mists.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Al-Medina Museum</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Situated on King Abdul Aziz Street in the City of Knowledge in Medina, it is the first and most established exhibition hall in Medina gave to Islam''s set of experiences. A unique museum showcases the rich heritage of Islam and diverse culture that will take you back to the chronological age with striking paintings and images. The museum also details the Prophet Muhammad P.B.U.H. publishing magazines'' life and conducts seminars on the city''s history and culture.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The Al-Medina Museum is open from Saturday to Thursday. Whenever you perform Umrah by taking Umrah packages in Pakistan,don''t forget to visit this museum to learn about earlier Islam.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Islamic University</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The Islamic University was founded in 1961 by the government of Saudi Arabia and specialized in Islamic subjects. It conforms to Salafi ideology and received N.C.A.A.A. (National Academic Accreditation and Assessment) accreditation in April 2017. The main goal is to convey the message of Islam to the world through Dawah and education.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Students from all over the world enroll in various Islamic specialization programs. It is one of the most popular places to visit in Medina.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Conclusion</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">After reading about these holy places and the events associated with them, I hope you will get inspired to visit them. A huge number of people like to experience an unforgettable journey to these holy places with religious enrichment. <h4>
<strong><span lang="EN-US" style="line-height: 115%;"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;">Reasons of Traveling to Dubai</span></span></strong></h4>
</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; line-height: 115%;">Dubai! A dream destination for many people. It is a common question which comes in mind of international audience. There are several factors behind it. Economy is the major reason. There are also other answers of this question?</span></div>
<h2 style="text-align: justify;">
<strong><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 115%;">Climate of Dubai</span></strong></h2>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; line-height: 115%;">Dubai has one of the hottest climates on the Earth. Temperature rises to many degrees in the months of summer people like to go to tourist destinations in the city. Many of the important skyscrapers and other corporate building are fully air conditioned. </span></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; line-height: 115%;">Dubai International Airport is also air conditioned so that the passengers can easily travel to local and international destinations. It becomes very difficult in summer months. The city receives rainfall in some months like February and March. </span></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; line-height: 115%;">The winter does not have very cooler temperature especially after rise of global warming. Winter also comes for lesser period of time.&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></div>
<h2 style="text-align: justify;">
<strong><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 115%;">Government of Dubai</span></strong></h2>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; line-height: 115%;">The city is governed by Sheikh Muhammad Bin Rashid who is the Emir of Dubai and is the absolute ruler. Federal National Council is a parliamentary category which has elected Emirati citizens as members. </span></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; line-height: 115%;">Interestingly, Government of United Arab Emirates is only unique government which is Minister For Happiness, Minister of Tolerance, Minister of Youth Affairs which are welfare category of posts created for the public.</span></div>
<h3 style="text-align: justify;">
<strong><span lang="EN-US" style="line-height: 115%;"><span style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;">Internationalism and Culture</span></span></strong></h3>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; line-height: 115%;">Culture of Dubai is mixed of Arabian and Western values. Some elements of Islam are also included in it which is rites and festivals. Society has become hugely westernized as love of wealth and money is extremely prevalent. </span></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; line-height: 115%;">Various welfare initiatives have also been given by Government of United Arab Emirates. Tourism is highly prevalent and people like to visit various natural and man made locations. International citizens have also brought their national values in Dubai.</span></div>
<h2 style="text-align: justify;">
<strong><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 115%;">Economy of Dubai</span></strong></h2>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; line-height: 115%;">Economy of Dubai is also one of the strongest in the world. Many of the professional sectors are developed there and lot of opportunities is available for individuals. Various types of companies are also present like multinationals, medium sized corporation and small business owners are also present there. </span></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; line-height: 115%;">Real Estate and Property, Construction, Diamonds, Gold, Industry and Manufacturing are the main sectors which are present in Dubai.</span></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; line-height: 115%;">These sectors are some of the largest what is operating in United Arab Emirates Much of the global workforce is employed in these sectors of the global workforce is employed in those sectors.</span></div>

<div style="text-align: justify;">
<h4>
<strong><span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 115%;">Transportation Mediums</span></strong></h4>
</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; line-height: 115%;">Transportation in the city is one of the fastest and most advanced. There are many means of transportation like rail, cars, trains and boats. Government of United Arab Emirates is doing more efforts to make transportation easier for the common people.</span></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; line-height: 115%;">Cars are found in abundance and they are main source of transportation for the&nbsp; drivers. Dubai has very high speed roads so driving there is very easy and many people are found to have cars of their own. </span></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; line-height: 115%;">Taxis are also available which can be used to read particular destinations. The city is served by high speed Dubai Metro Rail. Passengers go on board for reaching far away areas of Dubai. Automatic mono rails are available and they are important component of Dubai Metro. Attendants are present there in the case of handling any emergency.</span></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<span lang="EN-US" style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; line-height: 115%;">Dubai has busiest international airport in the world. It receives million of visitors from around the globe. </span></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">

The airline has received major global awards by traveling and tourism organizations around the world.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>

One must eat this specific food he has specially come to Karachi including foreigners.</span></p>

<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Juice of sugar cane is extremely popular among the people of Karachi and other foreigners. You can easily find that juice at small stalls. People drink this juice in the months of summer. </span><span style="font-weight: 400;">&nbsp;</span></p>

<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Faluda is a drink of milk which contains rose syrup, vermicelli, sweet basil and they are mixed with ice cream which is usually called khoya locally. The taste of this it is extremely captivating that drinkers usually come from far away areas. Faluda is sold at medium sized to large sized restaurants.</span></p>

<div class="custShortContent">



	<div class="custImageBlog">


		<img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/faremakers-connect.appspot.com/o/blogimages%2F84384293-13ae-404a-9556-5d95d5fd83bf.gif?alt=media&token=6782a4b9-e6ba-44f8-ab9f-3d0d0d2210c4" alt="travel-to-china" title="travel-to-china" class="picture" />

	</div>



	<div class="custTitle">


	    <p></p>


	</div>


</div>', N'<p style="text-align: justify;">China had opened its doors to the world in the ’70s, and since then, it has experienced a period of astonishing growth and prosperity. Now, more and more foreign tourists are visiting China by <a href="https://www.faremakers.com/china-southern-airlines-flights"><strong>China Southern Airlines</strong></a> to experience the rich history and to catch a glimpse of its shining future.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">It is no surprise that China allures millions of tourists each year. The ancient wonders, provocative cuisine, historical monuments, and the top-notch enterprise system can impress even the deaf and the blind. Also, the significance of the Great Wall of China is so unparalleled that describing it in words is near to impossible.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Even though the modernization of the country has streamlined the tourism activities, there are still some hurdles that might cause inconvenience for the people who are unprepared and unaware. This piece is intended to tell the people about the pivotal things that they must need to know before visiting this beautiful yet challenging country. Unquestionably, keeping these things in mind will prepare you for unexpected circumstances.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Cultural Etiquette</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">China is a reserved society, and foreigners mustn''t spoil Chinese traditions. While meeting the Chinese people for the first time, try to be somewhat formal. Instead of hugging, go for a gentle handshake. Chinese people find it uncomfortable when a stranger tries to hug or kiss them. Similarly, do not show off and avoid open displays of love and affection.</p>

<strong>Must Read:</strong> <a style="color:Purple;" href="https://blog.faremakers.com/Blog/2019/12/7/dont-forget-to-add-these-places-in-your-travel-list-of-2020 "><strong>Travel List Of 2020</strong></a>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Carry Your Passport All the Time</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">While roaming around, make sure that you are carrying your passport or at least the photocopy of the passport. It is due to the reason that after noticing your foreign attire and physique, the police might demand you about your personal credentials. If you do not have anything to show to them, or if your visa is expired, then you would be in big trouble. So, keep yourself prepared for unexpected official questions.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">You Will Always Be Served With Hot Water</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Chinese love hot water and tea. Even at the lavish hotels, you will have a hard time finding bottled or cold water. Similarly, no meal is complete unless it is served with hot water. It is widely believed in China that consuming hot boiled water increases one’s ability to counter the disease. So, it is best to bring your own bottled water; otherwise, you will be negotiating for days but would still not get even the sight of cold water!</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">VPN Is A Must</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">As soon as you land in the country after booking a <a href="https://www.faremakers.com/pakistan-international-airlines-flights"><strong>PIA Online Ticket</strong></a>, you would not be able to access the major websites, including Google, Facebook, Youtube, Instagram, and Twitter, etc. Due to the cold war between the communist regime and the west, it is the policy of the Chinese government not to allow any western sites in their country. You can only access these platforms if you have a good VPN installed on your mobile or laptop. So, never forget to install a VPN to connect with your friends in China.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Regulations For Students</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The Chinese policies are severe towards international students, and you might get expelled from the Chinese institutes in case of the violation of the rules. If you have a study visa, then strictly adhere to the following guidelines:</p>
<ul>
<li>Never take part in any political activity either inside or outside the institute.</li>
<li>You would be instantly expelled if you are found to be involved in any brawl.</li>
<li>Never violate any traffic rules.</li>
<li>Do not take pictures of crime scenes or police activities.</li>
<li>Never raise funds.</li>
</ul>
<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Language Barrier</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Even though the new generation of China is learning English, you will not be able to communicate with the older ones in a foreign language. It would be a blessing if you are able to find a native Chinese who could understand English. So, it is essential to tackle the language barrier smartly. You can either hire a tour guide or install the translator app to communicate conveniently.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Unpredictable Weather</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Nobody can really predict the weather in China. At one moment, it might be sunny, while on the other; you might be experiencing heavy rainfall. Generally, summers are hotter as the temperature can go up to 40oC. However, the winters can be severe, given the temperature could go as low as -20oC. Additionally, smog has recently become a major problem in various cities in China. Therefore, bringing a good jacket, air pollution mask, umbrella, or plastic poncho can save you from unnecessary impediments.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Bottom Line</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">China is a massive country with a diverse history and strict culture. If you go to China by keeping the above-mentioned things in mind, then it would be the most unforgettable itinerary of your life.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Want to explore the astonishing landscape of China? Just book the online ticket through <strong>farmakers.com</strong> for a smooth experience.</p>', N'things-you-should-keep-in-mind-while-traveling-to-china', N'Hamza Farooq', NULL, 999, 1, CAST(N'2019-12-07T15:00:00.0000000+00:00' AS DateTimeOffset), CAST(N'2024-03-19T14:16:25.3966667+00:00' AS DateTimeOffset), CAST(N'2024-03-19T14:16:25.3966667+00:00' AS DateTimeOffset), 1)
GO
INSERT [dbo].[Blogs] ([id], [mainTitle], [shortDescription], [description], [headerUrl], [author], [img], [visits], [isActive], [publishDate], [createdAt], [updatedAt], [blogTypeId]) VALUES (409, N'Eid-e-Milad-un-Nabi - Festival of Birth of the Prophet (PBUH) ', N'<div class="custShortContent">
<div class="custImageBlog"><img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/faremakers-connect.appspot.com/o/blogimages%2F84384293-13ae-404a-9556-5d95d5fd83bf.gif?alt=media&token=6782a4b9-e6ba-44f8-ab9f-3d0d0d2210c4" alt="milad" title="milad" class="picture" /></div>
<div class="custTitle">
<p>Celebrate Your Milad in London. </p>
</div>
</div>', N'<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<br /></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<br /></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<b><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mawlid" target="_blank">Eid-e-Milad-un-Nabi (PBUH)</a></b> is an important festival and
event for the Muslims. Prophet Muhammad (PBUH) was born in Mecca on this day.
Exact date is 12th Rabi'' Al-awwal 570 AD. Eid-e-Milad-un-Nabi (PBUH) is
celebrated in every country of the world and Holy Seerah of Prophet (PBUH) is
read for conveying message of peace and harmony to others. </div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<br /></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
Dr. Michael Hart in his book The 100: A Ranking of the Most
Influential Persons in History has ranked Prophet (PBUH) in top of list and has
admired his legacy.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<br /></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<b>History of Eid
Milad-un-Nabi (PBUH)<o:p></o:p></b></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<b><br /></b></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
Abu al-Abbas al-Azafi
was the ruler of Morocco and he has celebrated it first in history of
world.&nbsp; Muzaffar ad-Din Gökböri was also
important contributor for this specific day. He was the king of Syria and Iraq
at times of Crusades.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<br /></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
Slowly with the passage of time, every Muslim country began
celebrating however scholars in countries like Saudi Arabia and Qatar has
banned it. India has the largest population of Muslims in world and therefore
biggest celebrations occur there. </div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<br /></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
The festival is celebrated with feelings of extreme happiness.
Muslims come out on the roads in the form of processions for demonstrating
their love with Prophet (PBUH). Mosques are decorated with lights and they look
beautiful. Relics of Prophet Muhammad (PBUH) are also showed at various places which
could be museums, mosques and other places etc. </div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<br /></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
Many scholars have disputed celebration of Eid-Milad-un-Nabi
(PBUH). They consider some of the practices as un-Islamic and have compared it
with Christmas which is celebration of Hazrat Isa (AS). Years have been passed
and there have been strong debates between scholars however general public has
celebrated it thus neglecting views of scholars.&nbsp; </div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<br /></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<b>Eid Milad-un-Nabi
(PBUH) in London<o:p></o:p></b></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<b><br /></b></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
London has one of the largest Muslim communities in world.
Many people are residents whose elders have immigrated to United Kingdom. Muslims
celebrate Eid-e-Milad-un-Nabi (PBUH) in London in a joyful like they celebrate
in Islamic majority counties. </div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<br /></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
It also gives message of strong harmony between Muslim Ummah
which is observed all over the world. Non-Muslims also participate in these
specific occasions and they are introduced with the holy life of Prophet (PBUH).
&nbsp;</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<br /></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<b>Rituals and
Celebrations in London For Day of Mawlid <o:p></o:p></b></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<b><br /></b></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
Worshipers offer special prayers a day before beginning of Eid-e-Milad-un-Nabi.
Most of people do holiday in London for celebrating this event. People decorate
their houses with various lights and other illuminating substances especially
young boys take part exclusively trimming streets. It is a time taking process
and they feel enjoyed in doing this activity. Banners of Holy Kaaba and Mosque
of Prophet (PBUH) are also displayed higher in the streets.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<br /></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
International Seerah Conferences are held by the largest
Muslim organizations where notable speakers address the audience. Processions
are also held throughout London.&nbsp;
Thousands of people take part in the processions.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<br /></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
Flowers and cards are also given by the Muslims to other
people. There are also some of the important rituals which are to be performed.<br />
<br /></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
1. Obligatory Salat</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
2. Recitation of Holy Quran</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
3. Reciting More and More Darood for Holy Prophet (SAW)</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
4. Giving Charity to Poor</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
5. Teaching Seerah to others</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<br /></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<b>Salat<o:p></o:p></b></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<b><br /></b></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
There are many grand mosques which are located throughout
London where we can offer our obligatory prayers. Nawafil can be additionally
prayed for thanking Allah Who has sent His Last Messenger for teaching
beneficial knowledge to humanity.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<br /></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
Islam is the only door for entering Paradise. Salat should
be performed with complete discipline because it is the most important
commandment which was given as a gift by Allah to Prophet Muhammad (SAW) on the
night of Isra and Miraj. There are many verses of the Quran which highlight
importance of namaz.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<br /></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
Quran Chapter (2: Verse 153), (2:2-3), (2:227), (4:103),
(5:91), (29:45) are extremely important in this regards.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<br /></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<b>Recitation of Quran<o:p></o:p></b></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<b><br /></b></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
Quran should be recited on the day of Eid-e-Milad-un-Nabi.
It is the best way of getting spiritual pleasure and peace rather than wasting
time on useless activities. Quran is the largest miracle of Prophet Muhammad
(PBUH).</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<br /></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<b>Darood<o:p></o:p></b></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<b><br /></b></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
Darood should be recited more and more on the day of Eid-e-Milad-un-Nabi.
It is only advice which has been given to us by our Prophet (PBUH) and
Commandment in Quran for the praising the Prophet Muhammad (SAW). It is
commanded to us in the Glorious Quran:</div>

<br /></div>

angels [ask Him to do so]. O you who have believed, ask [Allah to confer]
blessing upon him and ask [Allah to grant him] peace.” [Quran, 33: 56''''].</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
<br /></div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">
Durood Ibrahimi is referred in Sahih Bukhari and Muslim
which means that it the only authentic way for praising the Prophet.</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="text-align: justify;">

</div>', N'<p style="text-align: justify;">Bangkok is the capital and the most populous city of Thailand, known for elegant shrines and energetic street life. Colorful, smile-inducing, fascinating, pristine, crowded, and noisy; you can add as many adjectives as you want to describe the city. The city is overwhelming, so be prepared to embrace a plethora of supreme attractions once you come here through <a href="https://www.faremakers.com/thai-airways-flights"><strong>Thai Airways</strong></a>. There is so much to do in Bangkok that sampling all the things is impossible, but we have put together these four attractions that are considered the major tourist spots of Bangkok.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Giant Swing</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Situated in front of Wat Suthat, the 27-meter high swing is one of the most eye-catching sights in Bangkok. It was built in 1700 for traditional Brahmin ceremonies. However, the lightning damaged it later, and so it naturally became decorative. After its erection, the swing was the primary focus of the annual religious ceremony held after the rice harvest. Various gymnasts would showcase their skills by performing dangerous acts on the swing. Teams of three would attempt to catch a bag of coin in their teeth while taking turns on the narrow board. However, following a number of deadly incidents, King Rama banned the contest in 1932.</p>

<p>
<strong>Must Read:</strong> <a style="color:Purple;" href="https://blog.faremakers.com/Blog/2020/3/5/visit-these-magical-places-in-chicago-through-kuwait-airways"><strong>Visit Chicago With Kuwait Airways</strong></a>
</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Wat Pho</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Certainly, looking at the jaw-dropping size of the statue of Reclining Buddha would leave you spellbound. The statue is so big that you would not be able to capture it entirely with your camera. The 46-meter-long and the 14-meter-high statue is surrounded by the Wat Pho, also known as the Temple of Reclining Buddha. This magnanimous statue stares up at the ceiling in enlightenment. Though the primary attraction in the temple is this statue, tourists can also indulge in observing the attractive murals that depict over 400 images of Buddha.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Grand Palace</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Ideal for family and couples, the iconic Grand Palace is located in the heart of the city. The palace was the official residence of King Rama, but now it hosts a number of royal events, including marriages and ceremonies. The palace will give you a chance to observe the royal life up-close, which will compel you to think how ordinary your normal life is. The pristine and lush green ground of the palace will force you to stay here for good. In addition, you can also admire the sheer grandeur of the Temple of Emerald Buddha, which is also situated here.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Chatuchak Market</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Chatuchak Market is the largest semi-outdoor weekend market in the world. From religious icons and jewelry to high-quality fabrics and pet supplies, shoppers will be spoilt for choice here. The fascinating 15,000 stalls in the market offer anything you can ever dream of. Surprisingly, all the essential commodities are available at a much lower price than any other market in Bangkok. Most importantly, try to arrive here early if you want to do this market justice: because it is an exceptional place to mingle with the locals and experience the genuine Thai life.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Touring Bangkok will permanently change your perspective towards life. You will then realize that Bangkok is one of the most magical cities in the world. Go to <a href="https://www.faremakers.com/"><strong>faremakers.com</strong></a> if you want to book your flight for Bangkok.</p>', N'visit-these-charming-places-in-bangkok-through-thai-airways', N'Hamza Farooq', NULL, 831, 1, CAST(N'2020-03-06T12:00:00.0000000+00:00' AS DateTimeOffset), CAST(N'2024-03-19T14:16:25.3966667+00:00' AS DateTimeOffset), CAST(N'2024-03-19T14:16:25.3966667+00:00' AS DateTimeOffset), 1)

<p style="text-align: justify;">If you want to visit Baluchistan for your business, or for any other purpose then there is great news for you. Now you’ll be able to book PIA online flights from Karachi to Zhob as this route is now finally going to resume according to the latest PIA news. It’s important to bear in mind that the airport of Zhob is now getting functional after three long years. It stopped working because of some internal issues and now everything is resolved and people can reach this place by air as well.</p>

<p>
<strong>Must Read:</strong> <a style="color:Purple;" href="https://blog.faremakers.com/Blog/2021/5/5/new-travel-advisory-of-pia-flights-for-saudi-arabia-travelers"><strong>PIA Travel Advisory For Saudi Travelers</strong></a>

It was an ATR flight that was carrying 36 passengers and it has a PK-528 code. This flight took off from the International airport of Karachi and landed at the Zhob airport the last Tuesday.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The passengers were greeted by Baluchistan Minister for Livestock Mitha Khan Kakar, PIA (Pakistan International Airlines) general manager for Baluchistan Bilal Afzal, Station Manager Zhob airport Abdul Shakoor, Assistant Commissioner Zhob Rohana Kakar, and other officials.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">According to PIA (Pakistan International Airlines) officials, a couple of flights will operate on a weekly basis on the Karachi to Zhob and Zhob to Karachi routes. They said that PIA (Pakistan International Airlines) had resumed flight operations to help Zhob residents who were conducting business or working in Gulf states. The one-way fare between Karachi and Zhob has been set at 6,500 Pakistani rupees.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Earlier Decision of PIA (Pakistan International Airlines)</span>!</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Previously, the PIA (Pakistan International Airlines) operated its flights between Quetta to Zhob to Dera Ismail Khan and Peshawar. People now can grab PIA online flights for these places. However, for unexplained reasons, the flights were later cancelled. There were 41 passengers on the flight from Zhob airport to Karachi.</p>

</div>', N'<p style="text-align: justify;">The travelers are found itself in the trouble to planning the family tour (the family trip refers to the tour with the kids) at any destination because in many cities, the family attractions are little bit hard to find, but in case of Istanbul trip, you will never stuck in this situation. This city has the loads of the family attraction sights, kid’s activities, museums, Parks, Shopping Malls, restaurant with the enjoyable experiences.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Istanbul is truly the gateway between East and West, we know, it is the cliché, but it’s actually as true as the universal facts. Not only does the city straddle two different continents over the Bosphorus, in fact, it’s a cultural crossroad of cuisine, majestic architecture and ideology with the layers of history. So, you can visit this city via <a href="https://www.faremakers.com/turkish-airlines-flights"><strong>Turkish Airline Flights</strong></a> because it offers you the fun experience holiday trip with your family. Below we have gathered maximum family exploring sightseeing in Istanbul that you can’t miss.</p>

<h3>1.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Hop On Hop Off Bus Tour</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The best fun experience with the family, to explore the Istanbul city is riding on the sightseeing tour bus. This Hip on Hip off the bus make your family trip very incredible and we suggest you that you never miss its ride because it make you able to meet with the highlight properties in this city.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">In 90 minute tour, it covers almost touristic sites, including the mosques, shores of Bosphorous, three world domination empires: Ottoman, Roman and Byzantine, colorful, vibrant past tour, etc. You can take the photos with families, collect amazing memories and spend really wonderful time that shows the vantage point for the panoramic views of the city.</p>

<h3>2.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Bosphorous Cruise Tour</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The Bosphorous cruise includes the sightseeing, sunset and dinner cruises by crossing the routes the Black Sea, Golden Horn and Princes'' Islands. It makes you able to move east to west culture.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">It is a fantastic selection of entertainment on the Istanbul family visit because you will discover spectacular views with the sound of the city, palaces, mosques, bridges, forts, different neighborhood and soaks up surrounding with Asian and European shores through the sea with the leisure experience journey along the family. The cruises begin slightly to the east of the Galata Bridge moving to the Anadolu Kavagi, which is the actually Bosphorus’s entrance to the Black Sea. It is most suitable for the family and the small group tour. You should never miss this fun day out tour.</p>

<strong>Must Read:</strong> <a style="color:Purple;" href="https://blog.faremakers.com/Blog/2019/12/27/the-ultimate-guide-to-travel-in-eastern-countries"><strong>Travel In Eastern Countries</strong></a>

<h3>3.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Isfanbul Theme Park</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The Isfanbul theme park is the huge complex in the Istanbul for the adults and the kids or families because it consists on the park, entertainment, exhibition points and shopping at one door. That’s why, we say it is perfect for the families because it allow the kids are involved in their activities while the adults are entertained in the shopping and further thrill rides such as: roller-coasters and carousels, etc. you can also spend time at the themed streets, great boutiques, festival and event areas, restaurants and cafes.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">You can entertain in the theme park without getting bored and enjoy the every step with the family and want to come again with the family.</p>

<h3>4.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Istanbul Dolphinarium</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The Dolphinarium is the great entertainment and an amusement centre in the Istanbul. The families and the young ones will be delighted to watch dolphins performing. The tourists or the local visitor enjoys the sea mammal show, massive walruses, white whale and playful fur seals. Not only it, you can swim with the dolphin, take dolphin therapy and dive with the dolphins, it all makes your day appropriate stunning and allure. This show is about 1 hour long, during it you can take family pictures with the dolphins and maintain more interesting picture folder. It is the biggest dolphin show in the Istanbul that you should enjoy in the family trip.</p>

<h3>5.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Miniature Turkey Museum</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The miniature Turkey museum is one of the never miss attraction points. According us, it is the huge and the Istanbul’s best attraction point, which is an open air museum. In which are displaying the Turkey’s famous and the greatest monuments.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">If you really want to see the entire Turkey’s monuments by the foot then you should explore this museum. All the exhibited monuments and other buildings are alike real one just in small size. It is the showcase of the landmarks and the architectural buildings of the Turkey. It also shows the multiple crystal glass of famous historical attractions. Such as:  Galata Tower, Hagia Sophia Museum, Blue Mosque, Ciragan Palace, Maiden’s Tower, Topkapi Palace, Fatih Mosque, Haydarpasa Train Station, Building, Istanbul University, St. Antoine Church, Eyup Sultan Mosque, Rumeli Fortress, Dolmabahce Palace, Suleymaniye Mosque, Istanbul Metropolitan Municipality and etc.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">No doubt, it is appreciate-able fantastic town which is also entertain you with the gift shops, Restaurants, café, children’s  playground, parking area and exhibition hall. You can approach, there with the family by the public transport or the private cab.</p>

<h3>6.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">The Grand Bazar</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The world famous grand bazaar in Istanbul is the main attraction and the compulsory part of the tourist’s itinerary and when we discuss the family trip, and then how the family trip is complete without exploring the Bazaar?  So, to add more taste in the family journey, you should go to shop in the famous Grand Bazaar that is comprised over the almost 60 streets or alleys and more than 4,000 different shops.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">This enormous soak has the variety of the amenities, restaurants, hamaam or Spa, mosques, police station, post office, health dispensary and franchise of banks, ceramics, shesha, sweets, soaps, chocolates, fruits, nuts, Turkish delights, spice shops, art items, handicrafts, Turkish carpets and many more. This Grand bazaar allure you and you just shocked to enter it when you confused what to buy or what not? Therefore, don’t skip this attraction plus shopping point in the Istanbul.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Conclusion</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Istanbul is the most captivating cities in Turkey. It captures the true essence of Turkish culture through its lifestyle, cuisine and architecture. <h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Weather</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Before arrival any destination, travelers must know it about the weather condition and when we are talking about the Bali then we just suggest you that, you should travel from December to the August. In this circle the climate is very pleasing, no rainy water store on the roads. So, it is a good time to explore the most wonderful place with the family.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Culture</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The Balinese are very strict about their culture and the traditions. Visitors should show respect regarding their sacred places, enter into the temple with wearing modest dress code and don’t try to explore those sights of the temple that are restricted to the public. They go to the temple at the daily basis with the traditional plate which is full of holy ingredients and complete the ritual regarding the God.</p>

<div class="custShortContent">



	<div class="custImageBlog">


		<img src="https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/faremakers-connect.appspot.com/o/blogimages%2F84384293-13ae-404a-9556-5d95d5fd83bf.gif?alt=media&token=6782a4b9-e6ba-44f8-ab9f-3d0d0d2210c4" alt="travel-to-new-york-city" title="travel-to-new-york-city" class="picture" />

	</div>


</div>', N'<p style="text-align: justify;">The city of dreams is a paramount place for artists, dreamers, tourists, and anyone who has a passion for exploration. Due to the diverse culture and convincing fashion, the city fills everyone with an enigmatic verve. Its stunning skyline and the out-of-the-world cuisine have the potential to put a magical spell on your soul. Indeed, your imagination towards the sightseeing would immediately change as soon as you breathe the air of this city.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Even though the hustle-and-bustle of New York fascinates everyone who prefers <a href="https://www.faremakers.com/"><strong>Cheap Flight Tickets</strong></a>, the city can also prove to be an intimidating place for first-time visitors. The cacophony of the crowd and the fast-moving life of the city might completely overwhelm your nerves, and you might deviate from the regular path.  So, first-time travelers must get an in-depth knowledge of the unwritten code of conduct of the city. Luckily, we have come up with ten vital things that will help you to spend your days like a real New Yorker. Let’s get started.</p>

<h3>1.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Best Time To Visit New York</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">You can visit this bustling city whenever you want. Each season in the city offers a number of reasons to visit. Early fall is suitable for the tourists looking for bright sun and comfortable temperatures while the late fall is perfect for the holiday decorations and Thanksgiving Day Parade.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Similarly, December to January is deep wintry season, but it also means better hotel rates. Plus, you will also have the chance to celebrate Christmas with unwavering zeal. The citizens of Pakistan get discounts on New York flights as the <a href="https://www.faremakers.com/pakistan-international-airlines-flights"><strong>PIA Airline Ticket Price</strong></a> goes down during Christmas. The city welcomes the spring with extraordinary pomp as the people shop at outdoor markets, dance in the streets, and dine outside. The days of summer are hotter, and you can beat the heat by going to the nearby beaches.</p>

<h3>2.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Don’t Stop Walking</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">People in New York walk fast, and it is important to maintain your pace and don’t stop walking. If you stop in the middle of the sidewalk, not only will you be hit by the walkers, but you will also invite their anger.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">It is because the life in New York has a magical flow to it, and not disrupting that flow would be a saner approach. However, if you are tired or want to take a photo, then step to the side. Similarly, if you are traveling in the group or are standing on the escalators, then make sure you are not blocking the sidewalk. Leave a little space for others so that they can get around you.</p>

<h3>3.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Use The Inexpensive Subway</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The traffic in New York is horrible, and the taxis in the city are quite expensive. For instance, a 20-minute taxi ride will cost you about $40, which is definitely not worth it. However, if you prefer the subway, then you can get there in the same amount of time for under $4.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">You can only use the subway if you have a metro card, which can be easily acquired through any subway station. The best way to get around the subway is through Google Maps. You just have to mention your direction and select the transit option. The app will conveniently inform you about the routes and stations.</p>

<strong>Must Read:</strong> <a style="color:Purple;" href="https://blog.faremakers.com/Blog/2019/12/19/6-things-in-new-york-that-attract-the-visitors"><strong>Attractive Things In New York</strong></a>

<h3>4.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Don’t Bring Your Car To The Streets</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Driving or parking in New York City would not be an economical idea. If you drive your vehicle on the roads, you would be shocked to see the highly expensive cost of the bridge tolls. Similarly, finding a cheap parking place is nearly impossible as you would be charged as much as $100 for one-day parking.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">If you have a car, then try to find the parking lot near Newark airport or New Jersey transit station. Here, you can park your car for the whole day in less than $25. However, if you can’t find the appropriate parking spot, then we recommend you download a parking app which will not only inform you about the available parking garages but also show you the cheapest ones.</p>

<h3>5.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Know What To Tip</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Tipping is a complicated choice while visiting any new city. In New York, you will be considered a penny-pincher if you don’t tip for restaurants, cabbies, bellhops, and other services. Generally, you are supposed to give 15% to 20% tip of your total bill. The workers do not like it when you give them only a few cents.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">When it comes to taxis, most of them have an automated system where you can select the tip percentage. So, you must need to have enough money in your wallet if you want to be looked like a respectable person in New York.</p>

<h3>6.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Don’t Go To Times Square Unless You’re A Broadway Fan</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Times Square is a combination of overpriced things, chain restaurants, and huge crowds. You should certainly not visit Times Square during the day or rush hour. However, you can go there at night because the streets and shops would not be hugely crowded. Most of the shops here often charge extravagant prices, but if you do the proper research, then you can buy the same things at lower rates.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">At night, Times Square is like daylight, and you will be able to capture the photos in the enlightening atmosphere. Indeed, it will look like it is the day of Christmas.</p>

<h3>7.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">There Are Plenty Of Budget Options</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">It is true that New York is one of the most expensive cities in the world to live and visit, but it does not mean at all that you can’t find the budget options. Indeed, you can find plenty of shops where the essential commodities are amazingly inexpensive.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">In Manhattan, you can enjoy a number of free activities like concerts, music plays, and games. Similarly, you don’t need a car to go from one place to another. You can go anywhere in the city by public transport. In Chinatown, there are lots of cheap hotels from where you can satiate your food craving with the delicious cuisine.</p>

<h3>8.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Public Bathrooms Are Rare In New York</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Never forget to go to bathroom before you leave your resting place or hotel because it is extremely hard to find public toilets in the city. If you are outside and want to go to the bathroom, then look for Penn Station or the Grand Central Terminal. Or you can also use a special trick that would never fail. Just walk confidently into a famous hotel or bar and go straight to their bathroom. Keep in mind that confidence is the key. The onlookers will not bother to talk to you if your body language is reassuring.</p>

<h3>9.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Avoid The People Dressed In Costume</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">When you visit an area that is crowded, you will notice a lot of Mickey’s, Spiderman’s and other movie characters dressed in enigmatic costumes. If you take a photo with them, they will instantly start demanding payment even though they did not inform you earlier that the photo would cost money. They can demand as high as $10 for a photo. Some of them also jump into your photos intentionally. So, try to avoid them if you really want to save some bucks.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Similarly, other guys will try to sell their CD by telling you ludicrous and fabricated tales. Don’t buy the CD from them as it could be a blank disc.</p>

<h3>10.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Best Dishes To Eat In New York</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Apart from offering the best shopping malls and stunning skyscrapers, the Big Apple is also acclaimed for its delicious cuisine. From spicy pizzas and sandwiches to the traditional falafel, New York has plenty of food items to keep you satisfied and occupied. The magical cuisine of New York is sure to leave you hungry for another visit. The city is best known as a shoppers’ paradise, and you will get lost in the glamour and glitz of its shopping malls. It’s been over 20 years since the sovereignty of the country shifted from the UK to China. Apart from an impressive skyline and mouth-watering cuisine, the city also has a lot more to offer including unique temples, mesmerizing beaches, forest-covered mountains, and the enigmatic hustle and bustle.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Additionally, you can celebrate festivals, view the city from high altitudes, and watch the sports competitions in the pristine playing fields. It is also famously said that the city never sleeps in the East. <h3>1.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">The Colorful Nightlife At Lan Kwai Fong</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Every country has got a place for nightlife, and in Hong Kong, it is Lan Kwai Fong. The area is located between D’Aguilar Street and Wyndham Street and is famous for its magical night scenes and award-winning cuisine. On Friday and Saturday nights, the area is dominated by the foreigners and white-collar workers who come here for entertainment and leisure. There is always an energetic party vibe at the place where everyone seems to be light-hearted.</p>

<h3>2.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Hiking Trails</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Hong Kong is generally advertised as a metropolis, but the city has over 70 percent of green area. Hiking the lush green trails of the city is the perfect way to get fresh air, enjoy nature, and explore the gorgeous views of the mountains. The most famous trails are Dragon’s Back and the Lion Rock that provide the visitors with the breathtaking views of natural scenery. Amazingly, hiking has become a great past time for the tourists, and they never leave the city without enjoying this activity.</p>

<strong>Must Read:</strong> <a style="color:Purple;" href="https://blog.faremakers.com/Blog/2020/1/2/where-to-find-the-best-cheap-restaurants-near-istanbul"><strong>Restaurants Near Istanbul</strong></a>

<h3>3.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">The Super Delicious Dim Sum</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Dim Sum is a local brunch that elevates the taste to the next level. The fried rice rolls and fluffy steamed buns stuffed with chicken or vegetable and served with condiments is the perfect way to start off your day. The difficult part is choosing the best restaurants amid a plethora of options. Either, you can go to the City Hall Maxim’s Palace, or you can head to Dim Sum Icon to get the real taste.</p>

<h3>4.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">The Eastern And Western Festivals</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">It does not matter at which time of the year you are visiting Hong Kong; you will always have a good chance to experience the diverse festival culture. Apart from commemorating the Chinese festivals like Dragon Boat and Mid-Autumn, the city also celebrates the Christmas and New Year’s Eve with the same vigor and zeal. During Christmas, the streets and the buildings are embellished with captivating decorations, whereas the firework performance and the countdown events are conducted at New Year’s Eve.</p>

<h3>5.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Shopping</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Hong Kong is Asia’s foremost shopping heaven as you will see the shops at every corner of the city. In Mongkok, you can get the charming flowers and goldfishes, while the Causeway Bay provides the tourists with an opportunity to shop the commodities under the neon lights. The Central area is the city’s economic and business hub where you will find the top-notch boutique stores and the dazzling shopping malls. If you are looking for handbags and designer clothes, then the IFC Mall would be the perfect place, while the Festival Walk is suitable for watches, jewelry, and cosmetics.</p>

<h3>6.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">The Creative Street Art</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The colorful murals on the street walls of Hong Kong will blow you away. Various internationally acclaimed street artists have left their colorful mark on the city by designing the Thai and Chinese graffiti. The citizens of China prefer <a href="https://www.faremakers.com/china-southern-airlines-flights"><strong>China Southern Airlines</strong></a> to visit Hong Kong.</p>

<p style="text-align: justify;">The city is continuously expanding its art culture by conducting art festivals where artists from all across the globe participate and show off their skills. The Shing Wong Street, Elgin Street and the Man Fung Building are the most prominent art samples that will surely give you goose-bumps.</p>

<h3>7.	<span style="text-decoration: underline;">Breathtaking Views Of Skyline And Harbors</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">Watching the gorgeous views of the city from Victoria Peak is an indescribable feeling. Here, you will have a bird’s-eye view of the Victoria Harbor and the stunning Hong Kong’s skyline. Even though the peak is a little bit chilly, but there is nothing like watching the sun across the horizons, lighting up the city. The panoramic view of the buildings will not only soothe your nerves but also compel you to contemplate on the glory of the architecture.</p>

<h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Final Words</span>:</h3>

The reasons outlined here have all the merits to entice your soul towards this mesmerizing place. Purchasing step is repeated greatly due to offers and promotions because the customers remain satisfied. Reluctant customers also like to buy from them.&nbsp; Many of the people who are new to the company also enjoy getting more information about services.</div>
</div>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="box-sizing: inherit; font-size: 14px; text-align: start;">

<h4 style="box-sizing: inherit; font-family: arvo; line-height: 1.2; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-top: 10px;">
<span style="box-sizing: inherit;"><span style="box-sizing: inherit;">Steps By Steps Procedure of Booking</span></span></h4>
<div class="MsoNormal" style="box-sizing: inherit; font-size: 14px; text-align: start;">
<div style="box-sizing: inherit; text-align: justify;">
I have made a list of steps for booking air tickets online which are mentioned below. You can read them.&nbsp;</div>

<div class="MsoNormal" style="box-sizing: inherit; font-size: 14px; text-align: start;">
<div style="box-sizing: inherit; text-align: justify;">
First step which come to mind that you have to open the website&nbsp;<span style="box-sizing: inherit; color: #333333; font-weight: 700;"><a href="http://www.faremakers.com/" style="background: 0px 0px; box-sizing: inherit; color: #266bb0; text-decoration-line: none;">www.faremakers.com</a></span><span style="color: #333333;">&nbsp;</span>or<span style="box-sizing: inherit; color: #333333; font-weight: 700;">&nbsp;<a href="https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.faremakers.android" style="background: 0px 0px; box-sizing: inherit; color: #266bb0; text-decoration-line: none;">open the traveling app</a></span>&nbsp;and enter you air travelling information in the search bar.</div>

<ul>
<li>Hello = assalamu alaykom.</li>
<li>Welcome = ahlan wa sahlan or hayak.</li>
<li>Thank you very much = shukran jazeelan.</li>
<li>Excuse me = afwan.</li>
<li>Can I take a photo? = momken asawwar.</li>
<li>Yes = na am.</li>
<li>No = la or kalla.</li>
<li>I want to go (location) = ureed an azhab ila [location].</li>
<li>I want a taxi = ureed sayaratt ujra.</li>

<p style="text-align: justify;">As you can see, travelling to China by <a href="https://www.faremakers.com/"><strong>Cheap Flight Tickets</strong></a> without taking precautionary measures would be catastrophic for your health. <h3><span style="text-decoration: underline;">Status Of Airlines</span>:</h3>

<p style="text-align: justify;">All the fights which are going in or out of Wuhan have been suspended.
